He is requesting a loan because he is preparing to cultivate corn, and so he needs seeds, fertilizers and herbicides.  With these supplies, he will be able to start the work he needs to do to have crops free of pests that will grow stronger and give him a good production.  Jose's goal is to have the resources he needs to grow these crops, since this is his source of income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer and herbicides

loans.name: Janeth Marlen

texts.es: La Sra. Janeth tiene 31 años y es soltera con 2 hijos que son de las edades de  8 y 10 años, ella se dedica a la elaboración  y venta de comida (chicharrón de cerdo) en su pensión que se encuentra ubicado en la zona de Santiago II de la ciudad de El Alto, este préstamo es el segundo que tiene con la institución, la Sra. Janeth va a usar este préstamo para compra de insumos como ser mote y chuño para la preparación de dicho alimento para su negocio,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es la falta de capital de trabajo. La Sra. Janeth  enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia diaria. Va a utilizar los beneficios en el aumento de capital de trabajo, la Sra. Janeth es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Mrs. Janeth is 31 years old and single with two children who are 8 and 10 years old. She works making and selling prepared food (fried pig skin) in her home. Her home is located in the Santiago ll Zone in the city of El Alto. This is her second loan with this institution. She is going to use the loan money to buy supplies such as corn cooked in the husk and freeze-dried potatoes. These will be used to make prepared food for her business. She is asking for this loan as she lacks working capital. Mrs. Janeth faces challenges daily with her business. She is going to use the loan to augment her working capital. Mrs. Janeth is a hardworking woman who is happy and grateful to the institution that provides her with this assistance.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as corn in the husk and freeze-dried potatoes, which are used in the preparation of fried pig skin.

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.es: Gerardo de 32 años de edad vive con su cónyuge y sus dos hijos en las edades de 7 y 13 años al sur occidente de la ciudad. Realizó estudios hasta Octavo grado, pero se dedicó a trabajar; su padre en su ejercicio de actividades de albañilería,  ensenó a Gerardo desde muy niño este oficio y hasta hace 6 años lo desempeñó. Hoy se dedica a la actividad del reciclaje de cartón, plásticos y cobre, principalmente. Su negocio es comprar y vender chatarras, actividad que genera los ingresos de su familia y que ha venido incrementando sus ingresos, porque también sus clientes se han incrementado. Muchas veces tener un capital de trabajo suficiente para hacer la compra que requiere, para impactar a su clientela es insuficiente, esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con la cual comprará cartón, cobre, hierro, aluminio, artículos para los cuales tiene como clientes a grandes depósitos de la ciudad y esto es justamente lo que hace que sea exitosa su inversión Credikiva.
texts.en:
Gerardo, 32 years old, lives with his spouse and two children, ages 7 and 13, southwest of the city. He studied until the eighth grade, but then began to work. His father, a mason, taught him how to do that work when he was a very young child. He worked in the trade until six years ago. 

Now Gerardo has a business recycling cardboard, plastic and copper principally. His business involves buying and selling scrap metal, an activity that generates family income, which has been increasing because his customer base has also been growing. Often he does not have sufficient working capital to make the purchases he needs in order to supply his customers. This is the reason he has approached KIVA lenders with his first funding request through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. He will use the loan to buy cardboard, copper, iron and aluminum, all products for which he has as clients the large warehouses of the city. And this is just what he will do so that his KIVA loan investment will be successful.

loans.use: to buy cardboard, copper, iron and aluminum.

loans.name: Mario Dieter

texts.es: El  señor Mario es cliente antiguo  ingreso  a la institución en el año 2005, siendo un cliente responsable y puntual en sus pagos hasta el momento, el cliente tiene la profesión de Odontólogo, soltero  que vive en casa familiar de  sus papas,  el señor Mario se encarga  de  los gastos familiares y   el crédito  lo  invertirá  en la compra de  un esterilizador y algunos muebles que le falta para su consultorio donde atiende a varios clientes ya que es muy conocido por el buen trabajo que realiza,  el siente feliz por la confianza que le brinda la institución nuevamente.
texts.en: Mr. Mario is a longstanding customer. He joined the institution in 2005. He has been punctual and responsible with his payments. He is a dental surgeon. He is single and lives in the family home with his parents.  He is responsible for the family’s expenses. This loan he will use to buy an autoclave and some furniture that he needs for his business. He has many patients and is well known for the good work that he performs. He feels happy because of the trust the institution has shown him once again.

loans.use: to buy an autoclave and furniture for his business.

loans.name: Erika Vanessa

texts.es: La señora  Erika, tiene 25 años se dedica a la venta de ropa, chompas según a la temporada,  es cliente antigua  de emprender ya que este crédito es su cuarta secuencia,  Actualmente tiene un crédito paralelo,  la cliente es   madre soltera y tiene un hijo de  dos  año,  ella se distingue  por ser un clienta  exitosa  en su negocio y tiene  grandes expectativas para seguir creciendo como un cliente  emprendedora. El  crédito lo invertirá en compra  por mayor de chompas de mujer por esta época de invierno, ya que con el anterior crédito le fue muy bien y sigue con la venta de ropa de mujer, su domicilio está ubicado en la zona la portada. La Sra. Erika se siente muy feliz y agradecida con  la institución por el apoyo brindado ya que con la oportunidad que le dan permite que mejore su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Erika is 25 years old and sells seasonal clothing, especially sweaters. She has a current loan. She is a single mother with one child who is two years old. She is a successful customer of the credit bank and she is successful with her business. She has great hopes of having continued success as an entrepreneur. She will use this loan to buy women’s sweaters wholesale for the winter season. Her last loan went well and she continues to sell women’s clothes. Her home is located in the “La Portada” zone. She is happy and grateful for the institution that brings her this support, as it provides her with the opportunity to improve the quality of her life.

loans.use: to buy women's clothes for the winter season.

loans.name: Lazaro Alberto

texts.es:
Lázaro, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para seguir abasteciendo su negocio comprándose cerdos para el destazo y bambú para la elaboración de canastas este préstamo le ayudara para tener los recursos necesarios y poder realizar esta inversión.
El efecto que tubo con el préstamo anterior a sido positivo prosperando y con lo cual a hecho algunas mejoras en la vivienda y en los corrales de los cerdos, sus circunstancias familiares han cambiado gracias a la ayuda de Kiva con los fondos que a mejorado su negocio y sus condiciones d vida.
texts.en: Lázari is requesting this new loan in order to continue supplying his business by purchasing pigs for butchering and also reeds to make his baskets. This loan will help him have the necessary resources to make a profit. He had a good result from his previous loan. With that loan he was able to improve his home and the pigpens. His family situation has changed for the better, thanks to the help of KIVA. With these funds he will improve his business and the condition of his family.

loans.use: to buy pigs for butchering and reeds to make baskets.

loans.name: Margarita De Jesus

texts.es:
Margarita, esta solicitando un nuevo préstamo con la intención de seguir trabajando y prosperando con su negocio de la venta de tortillas comprara maíz por quintales y leña una gran cantidad con el objetivo de tener lo necesario para seguir con sus ventas.
Con el préstamo anterior aumento sus utilidades generándole mayores ingresos a su familia y manteniendo lo necesario en el hogar.
texts.en: Margarita is requesting this new loan with the goal of continuing her prosperous work of making and selling tortillas. She buys corn by the quintal (46 kilos) and a great quantity of wood with the objective of continuing her sales. With the last loan she bought more supplies, which provided her with a larger income to use for her family and for home maintenance.

loans.use: to buy corn by the quintal (46 kilos) and firewood.

loans.name: Mary Luz

texts.es: ary  su anterior credikiva, la invirtió en cosméticos y fantasia, que su clientela compró y ella rotó rapidamente su inversión. En la actualidad está aplicando a un nuevo credikiva, con el cua ampliará su capital de trabajo, porque nuevamente comprará productos que han sido solicitado por su clientela, como perfumes, accesorios femeninos y fantasia en geneal, con la que planea tener una inversión exitosa, porque aprovechará las promociones que sus proveedores ofrecen por el volumen de compras y por hacerla en la modalidad de contado.Mary envia el siguiente mensaje a sus finaciadores de Kiva: " Gracias por su apoyo y espero nos continuen apoyando con este tipo de crédito, los cuales los ofrecen con una baja tasa de interés."
texts.en: Mary invested her last Kiva loan in cosmetics and costume jewelry, which her customers bought, and she turned her investment around quickly.  She is currently applying for a new Kiva loan with which she will increase her working capital because she wants to by more products that have been requested by her customers, such as perfume, ladies' accessories, and costume jewelry in general.  She plans to have a successful investment because she will take advantage of the sales her suppliers offer for buying in volume and for paying in cash.  Mary sends the following message to her Kiva lenders, "Thank you for your help and I hope you will keep supporting us with these types of loans, which are offered with low interest rates."

loans.use: To buy perfume, lipstick, powders, deodorant and women's and children's accessories

loans.name: Anarkul

texts.ru:
Анаркул 49 лет, замужем, имеет 5 детей. С 1994 года, в качестве основного источника для своей семьи Анаркул занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес с 10,000 сом (KGS). В хозяйстве Анаркул на сегодняшний  день имеется  50 голов мелкого скота, 2 коровы с телятами и 4 лошади, что приносит около 10,000 сом (KGS) дохода в месяц. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Анаркул обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS)  на закуп дополнительных голов скота.  Доходы от кредита Анаркул планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en:
Anarkul is 49 years old, she is married and has five children. As a source of income for her family Arankul has been doing animal husbandry since 1994, a business she started with 10,000 som (KGS). Today Arankul's business has fifty heads of small horned cattle, two cows with calves and four horses which brings around 10,000 som a month in income.

With a goal to further grow her business Anarkul has come to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan in the amount of 70,000 KGS to buy additional heads of cattle. Anarkul plans to invest the income from the loan to further increase of her livestock.

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Fatima

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 2 filhos que frequentam a Escola. Vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Faz negócio próprio de venda e produtos diversos de primeira necessidade, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (óleo, farinha, arroz, sabão, açúcar e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria.
No futuro pretende expandir o seu negócio para aumentar a renda familiar e melhorar as condições de vida, para tal tenciona pagar devidamente este empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a concorrência de outros comerciantes com o mesmo produto.
texts.en:
Fatima is married and is the mother of two children who go to school.  She lives in her own home with her family and doesn't support anyone else besides them.  She has her own business buying and selling various basic goods.  With her current loan, she will buy products (butter, flour, rice, soap, sugar, etc.) to increase the quantity of her merchandise.

In the future, she wants to expand her business to increase her family's income and to improve their living conditions.  She plans to make all of her payments on time so she can request more from Hluvuku.

Her challenge is the competition from other businesspeople who sell the same products.

loans.use: to buy and sell products (butter, flour, rice, soap, sugar, etc.).

loans.name: Casimiro

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 6 filhos dos quais 3 ainda frequentam a Escola. Vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Faz negócio próprio de venda e produtos diversos de primeira necessidade, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (amendoim, farinha, arroz, feijão, sabão, açúcar e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria.
No futuro pretende ampliar o seu negócio para aumentar a renda familiar e melhorar as condições de vida, para tal tenciona pagar devidamente este empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o custo de vida e a subida de preços no mercado onde adquirem os produtos para a revenda.
texts.en:
Casimiro is the father of six children, three of whom are in school.  He lives in his own home with his family and doesn't support anyone else besides them.  He has his own business selling various basic products.  With his current loan, he will buy products (peanuts, flour, rice, beans, soap, sugar, etc.) to increase the quantity of his merchandise.

In the future, he hopes to expand his business to increase his family's income and to improve their living conditions.  He plans to make his payments on time so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.

His challenge is the cost of living and increase in products at the market where he acquires his products to resell.

loans.use: to buy and sell products (peanuts, flour, rice, beans, soap, sugar, etc.).

loans.name: Carolina

texts.pt:
Viúva e mãe de 6 filhos já maiores de idade e todos trabalham, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta 1 sobrinho que vive com ela. 	
 Possui uma terra onde produz diversos produtos para a venda e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, ferro, barrotes e aros de portas) para dar continuidade com a obra da sua casa.
No futuro deseja ampliar a sua área agrícola e obter um meio de transporte para o seu produto, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é adquirir um meio para escoar a sua produção.
texts.en:
Carolina is a widow and the mother of six children who are now adults and working.  She lives in her own home with her family and also supports a nephew who lives with her.  She has her own land where she produces various products to sell.  With her current loan, she will buy construction materials (cement, iron, beams, and door frames) to continue the work on her home.

In the future, she hopes to expand her agricultural area and to obtain a means of transportation for her products.  To do this, she promises to make her payments on time so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.

Her challenge is acquiring a way to provide drainage for her fields.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (cement, iron, beams, and door frames).

loans.name: Zelia

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 4 filhos já maiores de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta a sogra e 1 neto que vivem com ela. 	
 Tem um negócio próprio de venda de produtos de primeira necessidade e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (areia, cimento, pedra, blocos e outros) para dar continuidade a obra a sua casa.
No futuro deseja ampliar a sua barraca para diversificar mais os produtos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais. 
O principal desafio é investir ainda mais no negócio para aumentar o seu rendimento.
texts.en:
Zelia is married and is the mother of four children who are already adults.  She lives in her own home with her family and also supports her mother-in-law and one grandson who live with her.  She has her own business selling basic products.  With her current loan, she will buy construction materials (sand, cement, stone, bricks, etc.) to continue work on her home.

In the future, she hopes to expand her stand to be more diversified and to sell more products.  To do this, she promises to make her payments on time to be able to request more loans.

Her main challenge is investing even more into her business to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (sand, cement, stone, bricks, etc.).

loans.name: Kelly

texts.es:
Kelly tiene 55 años, es una mujer trabajadora, empeñosa y con muchas ganas de salir adelante.  Está casada con Arnulfo, fruto de esa unión tienen 3 hijos, quienes son mayores de edad e independientes. Vive en compañía de su esposo y dos hijas en la casa que compró con mucho esfuerzo.
Su actividad es la venta de abarrotes, para eso acondicionó un espacio en su casa, donde atiende a sus clientes, que en su mayoría son sus vecinos, logrando tener muchos clientes. Se inicio hace más de 9 años con un capital propio y luego fue creciendo con préstamos de MFP. Considera rentable su negocio por la clientela constante que tiene, pues le compran sus productos llegando a acabar todo lo que oferta. Le gusta su trabajo, pues le permite tener un ingreso económico para solventar sus gastos, estar en la tranquilidad y comodidad de su casa, y además ver crecer su negocio a base de su esfuerzo. No le gusta cuando llueve mucho, ya que dificulta el tránsito malogrando el acceso a su casa y le ventas bajan, pero eso no la desanima.

Este es su tercer préstamo con la institución MFP,  por tanto espera continuar con sus objetivos. Por eso se compromete a ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas.
Con el monto solicitado, de 3000 nuevos soles, invertirá en la compra de abarrotes y bebidas gasificadas para surtir su bodega. También arreglará el techo y piso de su local para mayor comodidad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Kelly, age 55, is a hardworking and industrious woman who has tremendous drive to succeed. She is married to Arnulfo and they have three children who are grown and independent. Kelly lives with her husband and two of her daughters in the house she bought with great effort.

Her business involves selling groceries from a space she remodeled in her house. This is where she serves her customers, most of whom are neighbors, but she has many more. She started more than nine years ago with her own capital and later continued growing with the loans from MFP. Kelly considers her business to be profitable because she has a constant stream of customers who come to buy everything she has to offer. She enjoys her work because it enables her to earn an income for covering her expenses. Kelly enjoys the peace and comfort of working from home and would like to see her business grow as a result of her effort. She does not like it when it rains a lot because it becomes difficult to reach her house. Her sales drop as a result, but this does not discourage her.

This is her third loan with the MFP organization and she hopes to continue with her goals. Kelly promises to be punctual with her loan payments. The amount of 3,000 PEN that she requested will be invested in the purchase of groceries and carbonated beverages to restock her store. She will also repair the roof and the floor of her shop so that her customers will be more comfortable.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her store and to pay for repairs to her facilities.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 6 filhos que ainda continuam com os Estudos, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
 Tem um negócio próprio de venda de produtos de primeira necessidade e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (arroz, amendoim, peixe, farinha, e outros), para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria.

No futuro deseja aumentar o volume de vendas, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais. 
O principal desafio é investir ainda mais no negócio para aumentar o seu rendimento.
texts.en:
Carlos is married and is the father of six children who are still in school.  He lives in his own home with his family and doesn't support anyone else besides them.  He has his own business selling basic goods.  With his current loan, he will buy products (rice, peanuts, fish, flour, etc.) to increase the quantity of his merchandise.

In the future, he hopes to increase his sales volume.  To do this, he promises to make his payments on time to be able to request more loans.  His main challenge is to invest even more in his business to increase his income.

loans.use: to buy and sell products (rice, peanuts, fish, flour, etc.).

loans.name: Bernardo

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 6 filhos dos quais 2 ainda continuam com os Estudos, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta a sua avo e 1 sobrinho que vivem com ele. 	
 É serralheiro de profissão e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (barrotes, chapas, cimento, areia, pedra e outros), para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa.

No futuro deseja dar força aos filhos para terminarem a faculdade, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais. 
O principal desafio é concluir a sua casa para melhor confortar a sua família.
texts.en:
Bernardo is married and is the father of six children, two of whom are still in school.  He lives in his own home with his family and also supports his grandmother and one nephew who live with him.

He is a metal worker by profession.  With his current loan, he will buy construction materials (beams, metal sheets, cement, sand, stone, etc.) to continue work on his home.

In the future, he hopes to empower his children to finish college.  To do this, he promises to make his payments on time so he can request more loans in the future.  His main challenge is to finish his home to give more comfort to his family.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (beams, metal sheets, cement, sand, stone, etc.).

loans.name: Rahmudin

texts.ru: Рахмудин проживает в районе Дж. Руми. Ему 54 года. Он женат. У него трое детей. Он занимается выращиванием сельскохозяйственных культур. Этим видом деятельности занимается десять лет. Кредит берет для закупа минеральных удобрений.
texts.en:
Rahmudin is a fifty-four year old man who lives in the J. Rumy region of Tajikistan with his wife and three children. He's made a living as a farmer for the past ten years.
He's asking for a loan in order to purchase mineral fertilizers.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizers.

loans.name: Nazrulo

texts.ru: Назруло житель города Куляб. Ему 62 года. Он женат. У него трое детей. Он более десяти лет занимается ремонтом машин. Кредит берет для приобретения запчастей.
texts.en:
Nazrulo is a sixty-two year old man who lives in the city of Kulob with his wife and three children. For the past ten years, he's made a living repairing cars. 
He's asking for a loan in order to buy some spare parts.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts.

loans.name: Rustam

texts.ru: Рустам проживает в городе Куляб. Ему 46 лет. Он женат. У него шестеро детей. Он предоставляет услугу. Рустам развозит пассажиров по городу. Этим видом деятельности он занимается четыре года. Кредит берет для ремонта машины марки Газель.
texts.en: Rustam lives in the town of Kulob. He is 46 years old. He is married and has six children. He provides transportation services. Rustam transports passengers around town . He has been in this business for four years. He is taking out a loan in order to repair his car, a Gazelle [a Russian van brand].

loans.use: to repair his car.

loans.name: Zulmira

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 4 filhos dos quais 3 ainda continuam com os Estudos e o outro ainda não tem idade escolar, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
 É negociante dono do próprio negocio de venda de produtos de primeira necessidade e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, areia, pedra, pregos, e outros), para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa.

No futuro deseja construir uma barraca onde possa expor os seus produtos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente este empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O principal desafio é aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria, e concluir a sua casa para melhor confortar a sua família.
texts.en:
Zulmira is single the mother of four children, three of whom are in school.  The youngest is still not of school age.  She lives in her own home with her family and doesn't support anyone else besides them.

She owns her own business selling basic goods.  With her current loan, she will buy construction materials (cement, sand, stone, nails, etc.) to continue work on her home.

In the future, she hopes to build a stand where she can display her products.  To do this, she promises to make her payments on time so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.  Her biggest challenges are increasing the quantity of her merchandise and finishing her home to give her family more comfort.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (cement, sand, stone, nails, etc.) to continue work on her home.

loans.name: Mario

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 3 filhos dos quais 1 frequenta a Escola e os outros não tem idade escolar, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta o cunhado que vive com ele. 	
 É negociante dono do próprio negócio de venda de produtos diversos e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (amendoim, cervejas, arroz, refrescos, e outros), para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria.

No futuro deseja expandir o seu negócio, aumentar a sua casa e oficializar a sua relação, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais. 
O principal desafio é a saturação do mercado.
texts.en:
Mario is married and is the father of three children, one of whom is in school.  The other two are not of school age.  He lives in his own home with his family and also supports his brother-in-law, who lives with him.

He owns his own business selling various products.  With his current loan, he will buy products (peanuts, beer, rice, soft drinks, etc.) to increase the quantity of his merchandise.

In the future, he hopes to expand his business and his home and to make his relationship official.  To do this, he promises to make his payments on time so he can request more loans in the future.  His biggest challenge is the saturation of the market.

loans.use: to buy and sell products (peanuts, beer, rice, soft drinks, etc.).

loans.name: Kalyicha

texts.ru:
Калыйче 55 лет, имеет 6 детей. Калыйча с 1980 года занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес с 2,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Калыйчи в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется  5 коров с телятами, 40 голов мелкого рогатого скота, продажа молока и молочных продуктов приносит около 10,000 сом в месяц. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Калыйча обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку лошади и кобылы.  Доходы от кредита Калыйча планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Kalyicha is a fifty-five year old woman with six children. In 1980, she began an animal raising business with a starting capital of only 2,000 soms (KGS). Thanks to her hard work and dedication, her business has grown to consist of 5 cows with calves and 40 heads of small-horned cattle; the sale of milk and milk products brings in around 10,000 soms per month. 
In order to expand her business further, Kalyicha approached "Bai Tushum and Partners" with a request for a loan of 100,000 soms (KGS) in order to purchase a horse and a mare. Kalyicha plans to reinvest any profits from this loan into her business.

loans.use: to purchase cattle.

loans.name: Asadulo

texts.ru: Асадулло проживает в районе Хуросон. Ему 50 лет. Он женат. У него двое детей. Он занимается скотоводством. Этим видом деятельности занимается двадцать лет. Кредит берет для закупа бычков.
texts.en: Asadulo lives in the Khuroson region. He is 50 years old. He is married and has two children. He raises livestock. He has been in this business for 20 years. He is taking out a loan in order to buy calves.

loans.use: to buy calves.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a bed and appliances.

loans.name: Sarita

texts.en: In 2004, Sarita established her tailoring business. She is 40 years old, married and has two children, ages 21 and 17. Working 6 days a week and 8 hours a day, she supports her family. In the Kathmandu valley, clothing is made to order. Tailor stalls line the streets, where store owners sell material and work their sewing machines. These skilled tailors make school uniforms for children as well as the traditional women's kurta surwal and men's daura surwal. With a Kiva loan, BPW borrowers are able to purchase additional cloth material or sewing machines that will increase production and profitability. Sarita has already received and successfully repaid one loan from Patan BPW. She used her most recent loan to buy materials for her business. In the future, Sarita plans to uplift the economic condition of her family. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy materials for her tailoring business

loans.name: Nura

texts.en: In 2000, Nura established her tailoring business. She is 35 years old, married and has two children, ages 16 and 12. Working 6 days a week and 8 hours a day, she supports her family. In the Kathmandu valley, clothing is made to order. Tailor stalls line the streets where store owners sell material and work their sewing machines. These skilled tailors make school uniforms for children as well as the the traditional women's kurta surwal and men's daura surwal. With a Kiva loan, BPW borrowers are able to purchase additional cloth material or sewing machines that will increase production and profitability. Nura has already received and successfully repaid five loans from Patan BPW. She used her most recent loan to buy materials for her business. In the future, Nura plans to uplift the economic condition of her family. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy materials for her tailoring business

loans.name: Kamala

texts.en:
In 2006, Kamala established her poultry  business. She is 25 years old, married and has one child, age 5. Working 7 days a week and 4 hours a day, she supports her family.  

In the Kathmandu valley, raising poultry for eggs and meat is a very profitable business. Kiva loans are used to purchase chicks, food and necessary medicine to keep the chickens healthy. Once mature, the chickens are sold at small butcher shops or in the many open air markets throughout the valley.

Kamala has already received and successfully repaid one loan from Patan BPW. She used her most recent loan to buy small chickens for her business. In the future, Kamala plans to uplift the economic condition of her family. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy small chickens

loans.name: Hukala

texts.en:
In 2006, Hukala established her poultry  business. She is 30 years old, married and has three children, ages 12, 10 and 4. Working 7 days a week and 4 hours a day, she supports her family.  

In the Kathmandu valley, raising poultry for eggs and meat is a very profitable business. Kiva loans are used to purchase chicks, food and necessary medicine to keep the chickens healthy. Once mature, the chickens are sold at small butcher shops or in the many open air markets throughout the valley.

Hukala has already received and successfully repaid one loan from Patan BPW. She used her most recent loan to buy small chickens for her business. In the future, Hukala plans to uplift the economic condition of her family. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy small chickens

loans.name: Kanchi

texts.en:
Mrs. Kanchi S. lives in the village of Thecho, which is one of the developing villages of the Lalitpur district. Most of the people in this region are engaged in agricultural farming.

Mrs. S. lives in a single-family house. She has four members including herself in her family. Her husband, Mr. Ira S., is engaged in woodcarving work. She has two daughters. Both of them are studying in a primary school.

Mrs. S. opened her meat shop two years ago in the town of Kalanki. She sells chicken and buff (buffalo) meat in her shop. She opened the meat shop to improve the living standards of her family. Her husband also helps her in her work.

loans.use: to buys buffalo

loans.name: Nuchey Maya

texts.en: Nuchey Maya is 50 years-old. She is married and has 2 children aged 27 and 35.  In 2000, she established  her religious statues making business.  Working 7 days a week and 8 hours a day, she supoorts her family.  She has already received and successfully repaid 5 loans from Patan BPW and used her most recent one to buy raw materials for her business.  In the future, Nuchey Maya plans to uplift the economic condition of her family.  She thanks you for your support. Nepal has a long and rich history of traditional handicrafts.  Throughout the Kathmandu Valley, skilled artisans produce unique pieces of art that reflect Nepal's cultural diversity.  Terra cotta pottery comes from the red clay of the surrounding Himalayan foothills.  Bronze and silver statuettes are formed using wax molds and intricate hand tool finishing.  In Patan, Newari culture and traditions are reflected in the images and symbols etched into metal or formed in stone.  With the help of a Kiva loan, Nepal's artisans are able to purchase raw materials in greater volume.  This increase in volume allows a single artisan to work on several pieces at the same time while increasing her profit margin.

loans.use: to buy raw materials

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
Gloria tiene 39 años, es una mujer amable y muy entusiasta. Junto a su pareja tienen un hijo de 18 años. Viven en la casa de los padres de Gloria, donde también están dos de sus hermanos.
Ella vende de bebidas en su casa, compra a las distribuidoras, las pone a helar y las vende al menudeo. También vende comida en el restaurante de su cuñada. Lleva realizando estas actividades hace 2 años y le está yendo muy bien. Le gusta mucho trabajar de esta manera, ya que le permite disponer de su tiempo, además de generar doble ingreso a su familia. Adicionalmente, trabaja, en algunas ocasiones, como docente de primaria cubriendo algunas plazas disponibles. Así es Gloria, una mujer que trabajaba mucho, quiere mucho a su familia y desea superarse cada día para poder crecer económicamente.

Este es su quinto crédito con MFP, está muy contenta de saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, pues seguirá avanzando con su trabajo. Por otro lado, se compromete a seguir siendo puntual en sus cuotas, tal como le programen. Está muy contenta de pertenecer a su banco comunal, ya que todos son muy responsables y solidarios.
Con el monto solicitado, 2000 soles, comprará más bebidas para tenerlas en su almacén y ofrecer mayor variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Gloria, 39, is a kind, very enthusiastic woman.  She and her spouse have an 18-year-old son.  They live in Gloria’s parents’ house where two of her brothers also live.

She sells beverages at home; she buys them from the distributors, cools them and sells them at retail.  She also sells food in her sister-in-law’s restaurant.  She’s been doing these activities for two years and is doing very well.  She likes this way of working very much because it allows her to manage her own time as well as produce double income for her home.  In addition, she sometimes works as a substitute elementary school teacher covering for available positions.  This is how Gloria is a woman that works much; she loves her family very much and wants to improve daily to grow economically.

This is her fifth MFP loan and she’s happy to know that she has financial support to continue advancing with her work.  On the other hand she commits to continue to be punctual with her installments just as programmed.  She’s very happy to belong to her communal bank because they are all very responsible and mutually supportive.

She will use the requested 2000 soles to buy more beverages to have in her warehouse and to offer a greater variety to her customers.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Hans

texts.es:
Hans tiene 33 años, es un hombre muy amable. Junto a su pareja tiene un hijo de 9 años. Vive en casa de sus padres a lado de su pareja y su hijo, también comparte la casa con sus tres de sus hermanos. Él aporta mucho en su hogar, y todo lo que hace pensando en el bienestar de su familia.
Tiene un taller de motos y de motocarros en un espacio que implementó en su vivienda, pues trabaja junto a sus hermanos. Lleva haciendo este trabajo por 3 años y está contento de hacer algo que le gusta y generar ingresos a su familia. Al principio tenía muchos problemas, pues no se acostumbraba a trabajar entre fierros y aceite, pero con el tiempo fue agarrando el gusto por lo que hace y ahora menciona que no lo dejaría por nada, ya que tiene buenos ingresos y puede descansar bien. Desea muchas cosas, pero por el momento, lo que más quiere es aumentar la variedad y cantidad de máquinas que hay en su taller, además busca su independencia y espera, más adelante, tener un taller el solo y comprar un torno.

Este es su quinto préstamo con MFP, está muy contento de saber que tiene un apoyo financiero para avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado, se compromete, una vez más, a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en los anteriores créditos que tuvo. Le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas muy responsables y solidarias.
Con el monto solicitado, 1500 soles, comprará llaves de mecánica y otras herramientas para implementar su taller.
texts.en:
Hans, 33, is a very kind man.  Together with his spouse he has a nine-year-old son.  He lives in his parents’ house with his spouse and son and also shares the house with thee of his siblings.  He contributes much to his home and everything he does is with his family’s wellbeing in mind.

He has a motorcycle and auto repair shop in a space he set up at home since he works alongside his brothers.  He’s been in this work for three years and is happy to do what he likes and generate family income.  At the beginning he had many problems because he couldn’t get used to working among metal and oil but in time he started to acquire a liking for what he does and now he mentions that he wouldn’t give it up for anything because he earns good income and is able to rest well.  He wants many things but for the moment what he wants most is to increase the variety and number of machines he has in his shop; he’s also seeking independence and hopes later on to have his own shop and to buy a lathe.

This is his fifth MFP loan and he’s very happy to know that he has financial support to advance with his business.  On the other hand, he commits once more to make his installment payments like he did with previous loans he had.  He likes being part of his communal bank because all the members are very responsible, mutually supportive people.

He will use the requested 1500 soles to buy wrenches and other tools to equip his shop.

loans.use: to buy tools.

loans.name: Manju

texts.en:
Mrs. Manju R. opened her shoe shop in Lagankhel in a footpath market. She sells different types of shoes and sandals. Mrs. R.
lives in Tangal. Tangal is located in the Lalitpur district. Most of the people in this area are engaged in business activities. Mrs. Manju R. lives with her husband and one daughter. Her husband, Mr. Binod R., works with a printing press. Her daughter is in primary school. 

The rent for shops in Mrs. R.'s area is very high, and she can't afford to pay rent. She needs to purchase different varieties of shoes and sandals for her shop. So she requests a loan to purchase different types of shoes and sandals, particularly children's and ladies' shoes. She wants to provide a good education for her daughter.

loans.use: to buy shoes for her business

loans.name: Angelica

texts.es:
Angélica forma parte del Banco Comunal “Todos Juntos” perteneciente a la ciudad de Viña del Mar.
Ella se dedica al rubro de la confección, trabaja sola en su casa, se desempeña en este negocio  desde hace 3 años.
Comenta que sus insumos los compra directamente en tiendas de la ciudad de Valparaíso, ya que son lugares en los cuales encuentra su mercadería a bajo costo.
Con el crédito cambiará su auto para transporta sus confecciones a su clientela.
Una de sus metas es instalar otro taller de confección, para generar mayores ingresos así con esto optar a una mejor calidad de vida.
Angélica vive junto a su marido y sus hijos de 22, 14 y 8 años de edad, quienes se encuentran estudiando.
Sus sueños son obtener más ingresos, para que sus hijos terminen de estudiar, para ver su tarea cumplida.
Angélica está muy contenta  y agradecida de la oportunidad brindada por Fondo Esperanza, ya que el crédito le permitirá invertir en su negocio. Además se siente cómoda con el grupo del Banco del cual forma parte, lo cual la motiva a seguir participando en la institución. Comenta además que las capacitaciones impartidas en las reuniones le han servido para invertir mejor en su negocio.
Viña del Mar es una ciudad y comuna ubicada en el litoral central de Chile, conocida como la Ciudad Jardín debido a los jardines y patios que poseen algunas viviendas antiguas de la ciudad. También es considerada la capital turística de Chile.
texts.en:
Angélica is part of the “Todos Juntos” (All Together) communal bank belonging to the city of Viña del Mar.  She’s a seamstress and works by herself at home; she’s been in this business for three years.  She comments that she buys her supplied directly in stores in the city of Valparaíso because those are places where she finds her merchandise at low cost.

She will use the loan to replace her car in order to transport her creations to her customers.

One of her goals is to earn more income so that her children can finish their schooling and her task will be complete.

Angélica is very happy and grateful for the opportunity Fondo Esperanza is giving her because the loan will allow her to invest in her business.  In addition, she feels comfortable in the bank group she belongs to which motivates her to continue participating in the institution.  She also comments that the training received at the meetings have served her to better invest in her business.

Viña del Mar is a city and commune located on the central coast of Chile; it’s known as the Garden City because of the gardens and patios some of the old houses in the city have.  It’s also considered to be Chile’s tourism capital.

loans.use: to replace her car.

loans.name: Cheri Maya

texts.en:
In 2000, Cheri Maya established her business making religious statues. She is 40 years old, married and has two children, ages 19 and 16. Working 7 days a week and 8 hours a day, she supports her family.

Nepal has a long and rich history of traditional handicrafts. Throughout the Kathmandu valley, skilled artisans produce unique pieces of art that reflect Nepal's cultural diversity. Terra cotta pottery comes from the red clay of the surrounding Himalayan foothills.  Bronze and silver statuettes are formed using wax molds and intricate hand tool finishing. In Patan, Newari culture and traditions are reflected in the images and symbols etched into metal or formed in stone. With the help of a Kiva loan, Nepal's artisans are able to purchase raw materials in greater volume. This increase in volume allows a single artisan to work on several pieces at the same time while increasing her profit margin.

Cheri Maya has already received and successfully repaid seven loans from Patan BPW. She used her most recent loan to buy raw materials for her business. In the future, Cheri Maya plans to uplift the economic condition of her family. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy materials for her craft business

loans.name: Ram Devi

texts.en: In 2000, Ram Devi established her grocery store business. She is 38 years old, married and has two children, ages 22 and 18. Working 7 days a week and 12 hours a day, she supports her family. In the Kathmandu valley, the small grocery store, called a pasal, is an important part of the local economy. Fresh produce, milk and staples such as rice, lentils and flour are purchased daily for cooking in the home. Owners of small grocery stores use Kiva loans to increase their purchasing power and profit margins. By keeping inventory strong and purchasing in larger amounts, owners of these small stores are able to increase profitability. While a typical pasal might be no more than 100 sq. feet, they are always full of bargaining customers, incoming produce and shrewd businesswomen. Ram Devi has already received and successfully repaid seven loans from Patan BPW. She used her most recent loan to buy grocery goods for her business. In the future, Ram Devi plans to uplift the economic condition of her family. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy grocery goods for her business

loans.name: Mujeres De Cerro Real Group

texts.es:
EL comité cuenta con 12 integrantes, todas ellas amigas y vecinas de la ciudad de Caacupé. Ellas tienen actividades variadas, pero siempre tratan de trabajar juntas y hacer actividades para poder ayudarse en cualquier contratiempo que tengan.
La Sra. Albina se dedica a la produccion y venta de chipas, y comenta que tiene buena venta ya que siempre tiene muchos clientes y así vende todos sus productos. Ella se define como una mujer muy trabajadora y emprendedora, con ganas de salir adelante y superarse. Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de almidón, queso, manteca, anís, sal, etc. Con los cuales elabora las chipas que vende.
Agradece por la ayuda que recibe de Kiva y de fundación, ya que el crédito les será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
This committee consists of 12 members, all of whom are friends and neighbors from the city of Caacupé. They have various businesses, but they always try to work together and plan activities that will help with any difficulties that they may have.

Sra. Albina produces and sells "chipas" (cheese rolls) and says that she has good sales because she always has many customers. Therefore, she is able to sell all of her products. Albina defines herself as a hardworking and enterprising woman who has the desire to succeed and excel. She is requesting a loan in order to buy starch, cheese, butter, anise, salt, and other ingredients for making "chipas" to sell. Albina is grateful for the help she will receive from Kiva and Fundación Paraguaya. This loan will be of great help.

loans.use: to buy starch, cheese, butter, anise, salt, and other ingredients.

loans.name: Hector Asael

texts.es: Héctor Asael vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, y al mismo tiempo se dedica a la siembre de tomate, guisquil y ayote , tiene muchos años de dedicarse a la agricultura y se ha ganado mucha experiencia, gracias a su ardua labor y a sus buenas cosechas se ha hecho de muy buena clientela, pues todos están seguros que lo que comercia Héctor es de primera calidad y lo vende a precio accesible, fresquísimo recien extraido de la tierra,  además el servicio es inigualable siempre a la orden de lo que necesitan las personas; es un hombre decidido y trabajador dispuesto a superarse quiere tomar el camino correcto para llegar al éxito, quiere expandir aún más la siembra pero necesita de liquidez para completar su inversión, es por eso que le solicita  a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizantes, y semilla de tomate. Héctor ya ha tenido experiencia crediticia y está seguro que podrá responder a la deuda, además tiene la seguridad de que logrará llevar a su hogar una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Héctor Asael lives with his life companion and their children. He cultivates his crops of corn and beans, and at the same time he grow tomatoes, chayote, and acorn squash. Héctor has engaged in agriculture for many years and has gained plenty of experience. Thanks to his hard work and his good harvests, he has been able to build up a good customer base. All of them are confident that whatever Héctor sells is of the highest quality, offered at an affordable price, and freshly harvested. In addition, his service is unequaled because he always provides what his customers need. Héctor is a dedicated and hardworking man who is willing to do whatever it takes to travel down the right path to success. He wants to expand his crops, but he needs liquid assets in order to finalize his investment.

For this reason, Héctor is requesting a loan from Apoyo Integral in order to buy corn seeds, bean seeds, fertilizers, and tomato seeds. He already has credit experience and is confident that he can repay his debt. Héctor is also sure that he can provide a better life for his household.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds (corn, beans, and tomatoes).

loans.name: Lesbia Rosibel

texts.es:
Lesbia de 44 años de edad, soltera, tiene 2 hijos, y vive en una colonia suburbana de San Pedro Sula con uno de sus hijos.
Hace 4 años que doña Lesbia obtiene sus propios ingresos de venta de ropa como pantalones, camisas, zapatos, lociones, carteras y otra mercadería que le encargan los clientes. Ella es muy conocida en la comunidad y le va bien con las ventas, todo producto que compra lo vende rápido.
El préstamo que solicita es de 21,000.00 Lempiras y es el  segundo préstamo con ODEF, este lo utilizara para surtir el negocio en mercadería nueva como camisas, pantalones y ropa interior, con esta inversión incrementara las ventas y podrá satisfacer a sus clientes de los pedidos solicitados.
Su plan es expandirse a otras colonias cercanas donde la conocen  desde hace mucho tiempo para vender más.
texts.en:
Lesbia, 44, is single and has two children; she lives in a suburban neighborhood in San Pedro Sula with one of her children.

For the last four years Lesbia’s been earning her own income selling clothes like pants, shirts, shoes, lotions, purses and other merchandise her customers order from her.  She’s known in the community and does well with her sales.  All the merchandise she buys she sells quickly.

She is asking ODEF for a 21,000 lempira loan to stock the business with new merchandise like shirts, pants and underwear.  With this investment she’ll increase sales and meet demand for customer placed orders.  Her plan is to expand in to other nearby neighborhoods where she’s been known for a long time to sell more.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like pants, shirts and underwear.

loans.name: Zulfiya

texts.ru: Зулфия – 47 лет, замужем, имеет 5 детей. Она работает в детском саду дворником. Зульфия имеет свой бизнес. Она занимается вязанием. Опыт в этой деятельности более 30 лет. Она вяжет шарфы, безрукавки, шерстяные носки, детские пинетки и шапочки и др. Она умелая мастерица своего дела, так как вяжет спицами, крючком. У нее очень много своих постоянных  клиентов. Муж и сын Зульфии находятся РФ на заработках, присылаемые мужем деньги хватают только на содержание семьи, а на бизнес почти ничего не остается. На полученный кредит она хочет приобрести вязальную машинку и пряжи для вязания. Этот кредит 6 по счету. Зульфия выражает свою благодарность нашей организации за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en: Zulfiya is 47 years old, married and has five children. She works in the kindergarten as a janitor. Zulfiya has own business. She does knitting and has over thirty years of experience in this business. She knits scarves, tank tops, wool socks, baby's booties and hats and other things. She is a skillful master of her craft and does knitting with needles and crochet. She has many regular customers. Zulfiya's husband is now working in Russia. The money which her husband sends are only enough to support the family and there's not enough for her business. She wants to use the loan to buy a knitting machine and yarn. This is her sixth loan. Zulfiya expresses her gratefulness to our organization for the financial support.

loans.use: to buy a knitting machine and yarn for knitting.

loans.name: Arzykan

texts.ru:
Арзыкан 57 лет, имеет 4 детей. Арзыкан с 1980 года занимается животноводством и полеводством, начав этот бизнес с покупки кур на сумму 100 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Арзыкан в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется  20 кур, 3 коров с телятами, 50 голов мелкого рогатого скота, продажа молока и молочных продуктов приносит около 4,000 сом в месяц. Также, Арзыкан обрабатывает 3,0 га орошаемой земли, где она выращивает фасоль и многолетние травы.
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Арзыкан обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку минеральных удобрений и одной коровы.  Доходы от кредита Арзыкан планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Arzykan is fifty-seven years old and she has four children. Since 1980, she's run a farming and animal breeding business, started from some purchased chickens for a sum of 100 soms (KGS). Thanks to her hard work, her business now consists of 20 chickens, 3 cows with calves and 50 heads of small-horned cattle. The sale of milk and milk products brings in about 4,000 soms a month. In addition, Arzykan has 3 hectares of land she uses to plant beans and perennial grasses. 
In order to expand her business, Arzykan approached "Bai Tushum and Partners" with a request for a loan of 60,000 soms (KGS) which would allow her to purchase mineral fertilizers and a cow. She plans to reinvest the profits from the loan back into the business.

loans.use: to purchase a cow and mineral fertilizers.

loans.name: Dorys

texts.es:
Dorys forma parte del Banco Comunal “Todos Juntos” perteneciente a la ciudad de Viña del Mar.
Ella se dedica al rubro del comercio específicamente a la venta de almacén con productos de gran variedad. Se desempeña en este negocio desde hace 17 años.
Dorys se desempeña en sus labores de comercio todos los días  y su horario de trabajo lo distribuye de acuerdo a su disponibilidad.
Su mercadería la compra en distribuidoras que se especializan en vender los productos que abastece en su almacén.
Con el crédito comprará una fotocopiadora para su almacén ya que su misma clientela se lo solicito ya que en los alrededores no hay fotocopiadoras.
Una de sus metas de Dorys son tener una persona de confianza quien le ayude con su almacén para trabajar.
Dorys vive junto a su marido y su hija quien se encuentra estudiando. Su sueño a nivel personal le gustaría haber sido Carabinero, y sus sueños familiares son brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida de la oportunidad que le ha brindado Fondo Esperanza, ya que le ha permitido invertir en su negocio. Además se siente muy cómoda con la compañía de las demás emprendedoras del grupo del Banco Comunal, ya que comparten diferentes actividades, intereses, lo cual también le ha servido como un momento de distracción. Respecto a las capacitaciones en las reuniones, ha aprendido administrar su negocio de mejor manera.
Viña del Mar es una ciudad y comuna ubicada en el litoral central de Chile, conocida como la Ciudad Jardín debido a los jardines y patios que poseen algunas viviendas antiguas de la ciudad. También es considerada la capital turística de Chile.
texts.en:
Dorys is part of Todos Juntos Communal Bank in the city of Viña del Mar.  She works in the area of business, specifically selling a wide variety of products in a store.  She has carried out this business for 17 years.  Dorys works in her business every day, and she distributes her work schedule according to her availability.  She buys her merchandise from distributors who specialize in selling the products she stocks in her store.  One of Dorys's goals is to have a trusted person help her work in her store.

With the loan she will buy a photocopier for her store.  Her own customers asked her to get one because there are no photocopiers in the area.

Dorys lives with her husband and her daughter, who is a student.  Her personal dream is that she would like to have been a police officer.  Her family dream is to give her family a better quality of life.

She is very happy and grateful for the opportunity that Fondo Esperanza has given her because it has allowed her to invest in her business.  In addition, she feels very comfortable in the company of the other entrepreneurs in her communal bank group because they share various activities and interests, which also serves to entertain her.  With regard to the training in the meetings, she has learned to manage her business in a better way.

Viña del Mar is a city and municipality located on the central coast of Chile.  It is known as Garden City because of the gardens and patios of some of the old homes in the city.  It is also considered the tourist capital of Chile.

loans.use: to buy a photocopier.

loans.name: Apolonia

texts.es: Apolonia, tiene la edad  de 71 años, está casada,  vive con un hijo y el esposo actualmente. Ella con el crédito pretende comprar insumos como abonos y fumigaciones  y ayudarse con la mano de obra y además comprar una bomba de motor para fumigar el café. Ella tiene pensado comprar todos estos insumos y la bomba para darle el mantenimiento  adecuado,  así tenerlo en las condiciones más optimas  así  generar  el máximo de ganancias  y obtener una mejor calidad de vida y una estabilidad económica para ella y su familia. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja
texts.en:
Apolonia, 71, is married and lives with a son and her husband at present.  She intends to use the loan to buy supplies like manure and fumigation and to help with labor costs as well as to buy a motorized pump to fertilize the coffee.

She plans to buy all these supplies and the pump to provide adequate maintenance to have it in maximum condition thus generating the maximum profits and obtaining a better quality of life and economic stability for her and her family.

This is the first loan from Fudecosur.  She’s had no previous loans with state banks and Fudecosur provided the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy supplies and a pump.

loans.name: Flor De María

texts.es: Con 44  años de edad, Flor de María trabaja duramente para lograr sacar adelante a su familia y llevar el sustento diario a su hogar.  Vive junto  a su esposo de 42 años de edad y sus tres hijos de 22, 18 y 11 años de edad. La señora Flor trabaja muy duro en su negocio, el cual consiste en un comedor, en el cual vende variedad de platillos. Su negocio está ubicado en el centro de la capital, lugar que es muy concurrido y transitado por muchas personas.  Con mucho esfuerzo está dando el estudio a sus hijos, ya que para ella lo más importante es que sus hijos tengan una buena formación para que en el futuro puedan tener mejores oportunidades a las que ella y su esposo han tenido. Cabe mencionar que el mayor de sus hijos ya está asistiendo en la Universidad, esta situación la llena de orgullo y le da más fuerzas de trabajar,  para poder ayudarle en su recta final. En base a lo anterior ha tomado la decisión de solicitar esté crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de la materia prima necesaria (arroz, carne, pollo, frijoles, verduras, frutas, etc.) para la elaboración de sus ricos e higiénicos platillos y de esta forma espera dar un impulso a su negocio, que le permita mejorar sus ventas  y así poder seguir recibiendo los ingresos, los cuales son esenciales para llevar el sustento a su hogar y poder lograr su sueño, esta segura que productos de sus ganancias podrá asumir responsablemente el pago de su crédito
texts.en:
At the age of 44, Flor de María works hard to support her family and provide daily sustenance to her home.  She lives with her 42-year-old husband and her three children who are 22, 18 and 11 years old.  

Flor works very hard in her business which consists of an eatery where she sells a variety of dishes.  Her business is located in the center of the capital, a very busy location with many passersby.  

With much effort she’s providing her children with schooling because for her what’s most important is that her children are well-prepared so that in future they are able to have better opportunities than those she and her husband have had.  It’s worth mentioning that her oldest child is attending university and this situation fills her with pride and gives her even more desires to work to help him in the final stretch.

Based on the above, she’s decided to ask Integral for a loan to invest in her business purchasing raw materials needed (rice, meat, chicken, beans, vegetables, fruit, etc.) to make the delicious, hygienic dishes to give the business a push that will allow her to improve sales and continue earning income that is essential to provide sustenance to her home and to attain her dream.  She’s sure that with the product of her profits she will be able to responsibly assume payment of her loan.

loans.use: to buy rice, meat, chicken, beans, vegetables, fruit, etc.

loans.name: Israel Antonio

texts.es: Israel Antonio de cincuenta y nueve años de edad años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos, el se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz y sorgo, tiene ya muchos años de dedicarse a este rubro por lo que ha logrado una gran experiencia que le permite siempre obtener las mejores cosechas, el terreno está ubicado en un lugar cercano a su vivienda y es muy conocido porque comercia por todos los alrededores de la zona, las personas lo prefieren porque todo lo que les vende es de calidad y a precios cómodos, además de un excelente servicio; Israel es un hombre visionario dispuesto a superarse día con día para en un futuro alcanzar el éxito, siempre está trabajando pues su más grande secreto es el esfuerzo y la dedicación, en su última cosecha perdió casi el cuarenta por ciento de la siembra, debido a un fenómeno climático, por lo que no obtuvo mayor ganancia y ahora que desea invertir de nuevo para recuperarse, necesita de capital que lo respalde, es por eso que decidió solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz y sorgo, fertilizantes, herramientas y alquiler del terreno donde sembrar. Israel tiene experiencia crediticia y se hace totalmente responsable de saldar la deuda en el periodo establecido, al mismo tiempo tiene fe que le podrá dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Israel Antonio, 59, lives with his life companion and their children.  He works in agriculture, specifically growing corn and sorghum.  He’s been in this line of work for many years now so he’s acquired much experience that allows him to always get good harvests.  The parcel of land is located in a place that’s near his house and he’s very well known because he sells throughout the zone.  People prefer him because everything he sells is of quality and his prices are affordable; besides his service is excellent.

Israel is a visionary man determined to improved day to day in order to attain success in the future.   He’s always working because his greatest secret is dedication and effort. 

He lost almost 40% of his last harvest due to a weather phenomenon so his profits didn’t amount to much and this is why he decided to ask Integral for a loan to be able to buy corn and sorghum seeds, fertilizer and tools and to lease land to plant.

Israel has credit experience and takes full responsibility to repay the loan in the established time frame.  At the same time he has faith that he’ll be able to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to lease land and to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Emilce

texts.es: Emilce, tiene la edad  de 40 años, está casada,  vive con sus cuatro hijos y el esposo actualmente. Ella con el crédito pretende comprar almacigo de café y también  insumos como abonos y fumigaciones y además comprar una máquina para limpiar el café. Ella tiene pensado comprar el almacigo para aumentar su producción a futuro y además los insumos y la máquina  para mantener el café limpio de maleza y en excelente estado y así generar más  ganancias  y obtener una mejor calidad de vida y una estabilidad económica para ella y su familia. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Emilce, 40, is married living with her four children and her husband at present.  She intends to use the loan to buy coffee seedlings and also some supplies like manure and fumigation as well as to buy a machine to clean the coffee.  She plans to buy the seedlings in order to increase production in the future and the supplies and machine to keep the coffee free of weeds and in excellent condition to generate more profits and obtain a better quality of life and economic stability for her family.

This is the first loan she’s gotten from Fudecosur.  She’s had no previous loans from state banks but Fudecosur has offered the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy plants to transplant and a machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise (blouses, pants, skirts, and other things).

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es:
Roberto tiene 46 años, es un hombre trabajador y muy honesto. Su pareja tiene tres hijos, pero él los cría como sus propios sus hijos. Todos viven en su casa propia y desea darles lo mejor para tener un buen futuro.
Su trabajo es la siembra de productos regionales (yuca, plátano, ají, pimiento y otros), diariamente está en su chacra para cuidar, cultivar y regar sus plantas, ya que sabe que para tener una buena cosecha tiene que darle mucho tiempo a sus sembríos. Trabaja solo y en algunas ocasiones contratará a otras personas para que le ayuden en la siembra y cosecha. Lleva realizando su trabajo por 20 años y le encanta todo lo que hace, pues le gusta estar en la naturaleza. Adicionalmente, tiene una bodega en su casa, donde vende comestibles y productos de primera necesidad a los vecinos de su localidad.

Este es su segundo préstamo con MFP, está muy contento de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, pues se siente seguro de avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado, se compromete, una vez más, a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en los anteriores créditos que tuvo. Además, le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas muy responsables y solidarias.
Con el monto solicitado, 1500 soles, implementará la tienda que tiene en su casa; así también comprará granos y semillas para sembrar en su chacra.
texts.en:
Roberto, age 46, is a hardworking and honest man. His partner has three children, but he raises them as if they were his own. All of them live in a house they own and he wants to provide his family the best so that they will have a good future.

Roberto's work involves planting regional products (cassava, bananas, aji peppers, bell peppers, and other crops). Every day he is in the field caring for, cultivating, and watering his plants. He knows that in order to get a good harvest, he must invest a great deal of time during the planting phase. Roberto works alone, but on some occasions he will hire other people to help with planting and harvesting. He has been working for 20 years and enjoys everything that he does, especially being out in nature. Roberto also has a store in his home where he sells cosmetics and basic necessities to the neighbors in his area.

This is his second loan with MFP. Roberto is pleased to know that he has financial support and feels confident that he can advance his business. Once again, he promises to complete his payments, just as he did with his previous loans. Roberto is grateful to be part of his Communal Bank because all of the members are responsible and supportive people. The loan amount of 1,500 PEN that he requested will be used to keep the store in his house in operation. He will also buy grains and seeds for planting in his field.

loans.use: to buy grains and seeds.

loans.name: Juana Guadalupe

texts.es: Juana Guadalupe de treinta y cuatro años de edad vive junto a sus hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa, para damas, caballeros, y niños, tiene en variedad faldas, pantalones, vestidos, camisas, blusas entre otros, todo lo que vende es muy novedoso y es una de las razones por la que se ha hecho de mucha clientela además de que todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad y a precios excelentes, el servicio es único pues todo lo vende de forma ambulante o desde su casa; Juana es un mujer emprendedora, activa que ama su trabajo, siempre aprovecha todas las oportunidades que se le presentan pues sabe que son posibilidades para alcanzar el éxito, ha aumentado la demanda para su negocio y necesita de liquidez para seguir invirtiendo por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor. Juana Guadalupe no tiene experiencia crediticia pero tiene muy buenas recomendaciones de responsabilidad y buena paga, por eso está segura que podrá solventar el financiamiento y al mismo tiempo puede darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Juana Guadalupe, 34, lives with her children.  She sells clothes for women, men and children.  She has a variety of skirts, pants, dresses, shirts and blouses, among others.  Everything she sells is stylish and one of the reasons she’s acquired much clientele; in addition everything she sells is of top quality and priced excellently.  Service is unique for she sells from place to place or from home. 

Juana is an enterprising, active woman who loves her work.  She always takes advantage of any opportunity that presents itself because she knows they are possibilities to attain success.  Demand for her business has increased and she needs liquidity to continue investing which is why she’s asking Integral for a loan that will make it possible for her to buy clothes at wholesale.

Juana Guadalupe does not have credit history but does has very good references with respect to responsibility and payment which is whey she’s sure that she’ll be able to repay the loan while at the same time giving her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Delcina

texts.en: Delcina is a 52-year-old married woman from Antequera, Bohol. She supports her family by means of her hog-raising business. Delcina has limited capital to sustain her business. She has requested this loan to buy more piglets and feed. Delcina hopes for her income to increase, enabling her to pay for her family's basic needs.

loans.use: to buy more piglets and feed.

loans.name: Nidaa'

texts.en: Nidaa' is 31 years old and lives in the suburbs of Ramallah. She is divorced and has one child. Nidaa' has owned a beauty salon since January 1st, 2008. She needs this loan to buy chairs, cosmetics and dyestuff, in order to develop her salon and increase her income. Her ambition is to expand her salon, become well-known and improve her income.

loans.use: to buy chairs, cosmetics and dyestuff.

loans.name: Yahya

texts.en:
Yahya is a 36-year-old married man with two sons and a daughter. He lives in Tulkarem.
In 2004 he started his clothing business. He intends to use the loan to buy more products (clothes) and make decorations for his business. 
Yahya has a plan to expand his business in the future. His personal goal is to ensure a good life in the future for his kids, and also increase his income.

loans.use: to buy more products (clothes) and make decorations for his business.

loans.name: Hermes

texts.en:
Hermes is from the town of Antequera, Bohol. He has a small store where he sells gasoline and purified water. He also provides prepaid mobile loading to his community. Each month, he earns about 6500 PHP with his retail business.

Hermes is requesting a loan to buy more gasoline and purified water to sell. He hopes for his sales to increase as he plans to repair the roof of his store. He also hopes to be financially stable.

loans.use: to buy more gasoline and purified water to sell

loans.name: Luzmila

texts.es: Luzmila es socia del Bancomunal Amauta Huamanga, tiene 45 años de edad, es madre de 2 hijos, se dedica a la compra y venta de cochinilla. Es socia de FINCA Perú hace 17 años, está muy agradecida todo lo que ha aprendido y de como cambio su vida a raíz de todas las capacitaciones que recibió en su Bancomunal. Gracias a todo su esfuerzo ahora tiene una estabilidad económica. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de cochinilla para su negocio.
texts.en: Luzmila is a member of the Amauta Huamanga Communal Bank. She is 45 years old, she has 2 children and she engages in buying and selling cochineal. She has been a member of FINCA Perù for 17 years, and she is deeply grateful for everything she has learnt and for how her life as changed thanks to all the seminars she has received from her Communal Bank. Thanks to her deep efforts she has now reached an economic stability. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy cochineal for her activity.

loans.use: To buy cochineal for her activity.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: Julia es socia del Bancomunal Amauta Huamanga, tiene 62 años de edad, es casada y madre de 13 hijos, es socia de FINCA Perú hace 17 años, se dedica a la compra y venta de cochinilla. Ella recibió mucho apoyo de FINCA Perú, está muy agradecida por todo lo que ha aprendido en las capacitaciones de su Bancomunal, y así ella pudo enseñarles buenos valores a sus hijos ya es muy difícil poder criar a 13 hijos, ella esta muy feliz de tenerlos y de ser una buena madre, ha aprendido a trabajar y a valorarse, eso le ayuda a progresar junto a su familia. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de cochinilla para su negocio.
texts.en: Julia is a member of the Amauta Huamanga Communal Bank. She is 62 years old, she is married and she has 13 children. She has been a member of FINCA Perú for 17 years and she engages in buying and selling cochineal. She has received great support from FINCA Perú, and she is deeply grateful for everything she has learned through the seminars held by her Communal Bank: thanks to them, in fact, she has been able to teach good values to her children, and raising 13 children is very hard. She is very happy to have them and to be a good mother; she has learnt to work and to give herself credit, and this helps her progressing together with her family. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy cochineal for her activity.

loans.use: To buy cochineal for her activity.

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.es: Gregoria es socia del Bancomunal Amauta Huamanga, tiene 33 años de edad, es madre de un hijo, es dueña de un restaurante. Es socia de FINCA Perú hace 3 años, ella aprendió a ahorrar, a ser responsable y puntual. Está muy agradecida por todo el apoyo que la institución le brinda a las mujeres que empiezan un negocio, y gracias a eso ahora puede gozar de una mejor economía. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de arroz y azúcar por sacos para su restaurante.
texts.en: Gregoria is a member of the Amauta Huamanga Communal Bank. She is 33 years old, she has one son and she owns a restaurant. She has been a member of FINCA Perù for 3 years, and here she has learnt to save money, to be responsible and punctual. She is deeply grateful for the support granted from the institution to those women who start and economic activity, and thanks to this she can now live in better economic conditions. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy bags of rice and bags of sugar for her restaurant.

loans.use: To buy bags of rice and bags of sugar.

loans.name: Herminia

texts.es: Herminia es socia del Bancomunal Alondras, es madre de 4  hijos y es socia de FINCA Perú hace  15 años. Se dedica a la compra y venta de carne. Se siente una mujer exitosa  por todo lo que ha logrado, como construir su vivienda,  y educar a sus hijos. Agradece a la institución por todas las facilidades de crédito que le ofrece y por las capacitaciones que recibe en su Bancomunal ya que son mucha ayuda tanto en su vida personal como laboral. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de ganados (ovino, vacuno y porcino) para su negocio.
texts.en: Herminia is a member of the Las Alondras (The Larks) Communal Bank. She has 4 children and she engages in buying and selling meat. She has been a member of FINCA Perù for 15 years, and she feels very successful because of everything she has achieved, such has having her house built and provide her children with an education. She is grateful to the institution for the terms of the loans she has been offered and for the seminars held by her Communal Bank, as these are very helpful both for her personal life and for her job. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy sheep, pigs and cattle for her activity.

loans.use: To buy sheep, pigs and cattle for her activity.

loans.name: Anita

texts.es:
Anita tiene 48 años, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Su pareja, Walter, es agricultor y el padre de sus hijos. Vive cómodamente en la casa que compró a base de esfuerzo, junto a su pareja y su hija Vivian de 9 años de edad. 
Tiene una bodega en su casa, equipada con una refrigeradora, pues también vende bebidas heladas, debido al calor de la zona. Se inició hace más de un año en esta actividad, contando con un capital propio, comprando y vendiendo en pequeñas cantidades, luego fue aumentando sus compras viendo que se incrementaba la demanda, y hasta el momento lo viene realizando muy bien. Con este negocio puede apoyar a su pareja a sacar adelante a su familia. Por ello, desea continuar con esta actividad e incrementar su stock de sus productos.

Este es su segundo préstamo con la institución MFP. Está contenta y agradecida de saber que contará con el apoyo financiero para continuar con sus planes. Además se siente cómoda y le gusta el trabajo de su banco comunal, pues conoce a sus integrantes y los considera personas responsables.
Con el monto solicitado, de 1000 nuevos soles, invertirá en la compra de más bebidas y abarrotes en general.
texts.en:
