Anita is 48 years old. She is a hard-working woman who greatly desires to succeed. Her partner, Walter, is a farmer and the father of her children. She lives comfortably in the house which she bought through great effort with her partner and her nine year old daughter, Vivian. 
She has a store in her home equipped with a refrigerator. She also sells chilled drinks on account of the hot weather in the area. She started her business more than a year ago with her own capital, selling and buying products in small quantities. Later, she increased her sales since the demand was increasing. So far, the business is going very well. With this business, she can help her partner to move her family forward. She wants to continue with this business and increase her stock of products. 

This is her second loan with the MFP institution. She is happy and grateful to know that she has the financial support to continue with her plans. In addition, she feels comfortable and she likes the work of her communal bank since she knows the members and considers them to be responsible people. 
With the loan request of 1000 nuevos soles, she will invest in the purchase of more drinks and groceries in general.

loans.use: increase merchandise.

loans.name: Ana Marizela

texts.es: Ana Marizela tiene 31 años de edad y habita en casa de  su propiedad junto a sus tres hijos los cuales se encuentran estudiando.  Debido a que la situación económica cada vez se ponía más difícil y ya no era posible dar a la familia el sustento, el esposo de la señora Ana tomo la decisión de salir del país hacia Estados Unidos, con el fin de mejorar la situación de su familia y poder ayudar a sus hijos con el estudio. Mientras él encontraba un trabajo en el extranjero Ana emprendió su negocio que consiste en la venta de productos por catalogo, gracias a éste y a los ingresos que recibe de su esposo ha logrado sacar adelante a su familia. Su venta la realiza de manera ambulante en las diferentes zonas del municipio donde habita. Es una mujer muy responsable, trabajadora y dinámica, ya que ha sabido ganarse la confianza de muchas personas,  las cuales cada día le demandan más de sus productos ya que confían  en ella  y en los productos que distribuye. Como toda mujer visionaria la cual quiere continuar colaborando con la economía del hogar ha tomado la decisión de invertir en la compra de productos por catalogo al por mayor tales como: cremas, lociones, tintes, champú, desodorantes, maquillaje, etc. ya que quiere darle un impulso a su negocio para poder percibir una mejor ganancia que le permita  colaborar de mejor manera con la economía del hogar.  Es por esta razón que solicita crédito a INTEGRAL ya que no puede hacer la inversión por sus medios. Confía que tendrá resultados favorables.
texts.en:
Ana Marizela is 31 years old and lives in her own home with her three children who are studying. Because her family's financial situation was getting more difficult and there were no opportunities to support the family, Sra. Ana's husband decided to leave for the United States in order to provide for them and help the children with their education. While he works abroad, Ana started a business that consists of selling products through catalogs. Thanks to this business and the remittances sent by her husband, her family is able to get ahead.

Ana sells by traveling to different areas of the town where she lives. She is a responsible, hardworking, and dynamic woman who knows how to gain the trust of many people who demand more of her products each day. Her customers have confidence in her and in the products she distributes. Being a visionary woman, Ana wants to continue contributing toward the household finances. Therefore, she has made the decision to invest in the purchase of catalog products in bulk such as crèmes, lotions, dyes, shampoo, deodorants, makeup, and other items. This will provide a boost to her business so that she can generate a better profit and contribute more to the household finances. She is requesting a loan from Apoyo Integral since she has no other means of making this investment. Ana is confident of attaining positive results.

loans.use: to buy crèmes, lotions, dyes, shampoo, deodorants, makeup, and other items.

loans.name: Celina

texts.es:
Celina tiene 59 años, es una mujer empeñosa que trabajó a los largo de su vida buscando progresar. Su pareja es Fidel, el padre de sus hijos. Actualmente viven cómodamente en su casa propia con su hija Wini, de 18 años, y un nieto.

Se dedica a la elaboración y venta de carbón a base de desechos de maderas de los aserraderos cercanos. Tiene un espacio al costado de un aserradero donde apila sus maderas y los prende fuego dejándolas quemar por varios días, quedando listo el carbón para la venta. Se inicio hace más de 20 años con esta actividad, empezando de a poco, con un capital propio que fue haciendo crecer con bastante esfuerzo y hasta el momento lo realiza sola, contratando personas para la preparación de los hornos artesanales. Considera rentable su negocio por las buenas ganancias que les deja, así como la demanda que le permite vender toda su producción.
Decidió empezar esta labor por la necesidad de contar con un ingreso económico para sostener  a su familia, brindándoles una buena educación a sus hijos, siendo ese su mayor orgullo.

Este es su préstamo número 12 con la institución MFP. Está contenta y agradecida de saber que contará con el apoyo financiero para seguir avanzando con su negocio. Además está a gusto con su banco comunal, pues conoce  a sus integrantes y los considera personas responsables.
Con el monto solicitado, de 1000 nuevos soles, invertirá en la compra de la materia prima para la elaboración del carbón: desechos de madera.
texts.en:
Celina is 59, she is a driven woman who has worked throughout her life looking to progress. Her partner is Fidel who is the father of her children. At the moment they live comfortably in their own house with their 18 year old daughter and grandson. 

She earns a living making and selling charcoal from recycled wood from neighbouring sawmills. She has a space beside a sawmill where she piles her wood and lights them up, letting them burn for some days, and then what is left is the charcoal for selling.
She started her business more than 20 years ago, little by little, with her own money that she made grow with lots of effort. So far she does it alone, hiring people for the making of the artisan ovens. 
She considers her business successful because of the good profits they get and because her charcoal is in big demand and it allows her to sell all her production. 

She decided to start this work out of the necessity to have an economic income to support her family, giving her children a good education which is her biggest pride.

This is her 12th loan with MFP. She is happy and grateful to know that she can count on the financial support to keep making progress with her business. she is also pleased with her communal bank because she knows the other members and considers them responsible people.

With the amount she is requesting 1000 (PEN) she will invest in the purchase of raw material for making charcoal: cast off wood.

loans.use: to buy wood

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seeds (corn and beans), fertilizers, and a dairy cow.

loans.name: Víctor Hugo

texts.es: Víctor Hugo, habita junto a su compañera de vida y sus tres hijos de 17, 14 y 12 años de edad. Él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijoles desde hace muchos años. Con mucho esfuerzo y sobre todo trabajo ha logrado sacar adelante a su familia, dado que él es el único que recibe remuneración por el trabajo que realiza. Cada año repite  la actividad de la siembra, la cual consiste en preparar la tierra, sembrar y luego sacar la cosecha. Después  de sacar la cosecha, pone a la venta una parte de esta cosecha  en los principales mercados o lugares adecuados para la venta en la zona donde habita. Tiene algunos clientes fijos los cuales al sacar la cosecha lo buscan para comprar los granos básicos. Con la llegada del invierno también se hace presenta la temporada para la siembra por lo que ha decidido acercarse a esta institución para solicitar este crédito que le permita realizar la compra de los insumos agrícolas como: abonos, controles de plagas y semillas. Confía que con la ayuda de esta institución, INTEGRAL, y con su trabajo logrará una excelente cosecha que le permitirá continuar llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en: Víctor Hugo lives with his life partner and their three children of 17, 14, and 12 years of age. He has made a living growing corn and beans for many years. With much effort and above all other work he has achieved getting his family ahead, given that he is the only one that receives compensation for the work that he does. Every year he repeats his work of sowing, which consists of preparing the earth, sowing, and later harvesting the crop. After harvesting the crop he puts part of it up for sale in the main markets or appropriate places in the area where he lives. He has some permanent customers who look for him to buy basic grains after he harvests his crop. The arrival of winter has also launched the sowing season and for this reason he has decided to come to this institution in order to request a loan which will allow him to buy agricultural supplies like: fertilizers, pest controls, and seeds. He trusts that with the help of this institution, Integral, and with his work, he will achieve an excellent harvest that will allow him to continue bringing bread home every day.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pest controls, and seeds.

loans.name: María Ester

texts.es: María Ester tiene 60 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad junto con sus 2 hijos los cuales ya son mayores de edad y colaboran con la economía del hogar.  A pesar de su avanzada edad no se cansa de trabajar dado que es una mujer emprendedora. Desde hace mucho tiempo que estableció un negocio, el cual consiste en venta y elaboración de tortillas, venta de gas propano y bebidas. Dicho negocio está ubicado en su hogar.  Con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación ha lo grado mantenerlo activo ya que por mucho tiempo este negocio fue la principal fuente de ingresos con la que contó. En la actualidad, mantiene su hogar con la ayuda de sus hijos, ya que gracias a la educación que ella supo darles ahora son hombres de provecho, los cuales cuentan con un empleo.  Su sueño es continuar manteniendo activo su negocio ya que ella es una mujer de trabajo la cual no le gusta quedarse de brazos cruzados.  Por lo anterior ha tomado la decisión de invertir en su negocio, dado que desea mantenerlo activo por mucho más  tiempo. Esto la motivó a acercarse a INTEGRAL para solicitar este crédito que le permita mejorar el movimiento de su negocio dado que solo así podrá estar un paso delante de la competencia y podrá mantener activo el negocio por mucho más tiempo. Con el crédito desea comprar: maíz, gas propano y bebidas. Confía que de esta forma su calidad de vida  y la de sus hijos será mucho mejor.
texts.en: María Ester is 60 years old. She lives in her own house with her two children who are older in age and help with the household expenses. In spite of her older age, she has not stopped working given that she is an entrepreneurial woman. Many years ago, Maria established a business making and selling tortillas and selling propane gas and beverages. This business is located in her home. With a lot of effort and dedication, the business has been maintained and active. For a long time, this business was the main source of income. Now she maintains her home with the help of her sons. Thanks to the education that they received, they are now good men and they are employed. Her dream is to continue keeping her business active since she is a working woman who does not like to stay with her arms crossed. She took the decision to invest in her business given that she wants to keep the business active for much more time. This is her reason for coming to INTEGRAL in order to request this loan. It will allow her to improve the movement of her business because only then will she be able to stay one step ahead of the competition and keep her business active for a long time. With the loan, she wants to purchase: corn, propane gas and beverages. She confides that her own quality of life and her children’s quality of life will be much better.

loans.use: purchase corn, propane gas and beverages.

loans.name: Blanca Mirian

texts.es: Blanca Mirian de treinta y nueve años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hija en casa propia, ella posee una pupusería en la localidad donde reside, es muy conocida en el lugar pues vende las pupusas más exquisitas y en variedad, revueltas, queso con frijol, queso, chicharrón entre otras, los clientes la prefieren porque todo es elaborado con material de primera calidad, con higiene y lo vende a precios accesibles además tiene el servicio más rápido de la zona, Blanca es una mujer muy trabajadora con un excelente don en la cocina, ella ama su labor y siempre pone todo de su parte para seguir superándose, sabe que solo así alcanzara el éxito en un futuro, ella siempre se mantiene al frente de su competencia y cada vez más aumenta la demanda por eso quiere aumentar su producción solicitándole a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar  maíz, arroz, queso, frijoles, chicharrón entre otros. Blanca tiene capacidad  crediticia y sabe que podrá responder al pago,  al mismo tiempo darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Blanca Mirian is 39 years old and lives together with her life partner and their daughter in their home. She has a store where she sells pupusas- thick corn tortillas stuffed with cheese, fried pork rind, chicken, or refried beans- in the locality where she resides. She's very well-known in her area as she sells a variety of the most exquisite pupusas: scrambled, cheese with beans, cheese, and pork cracklings, among others. Customers prefer her because everything is made with ingredients of the best quality and using good hygiene, and she sells them at affordable prices. Moreover she has the fastest service in the area. Blanca is a very hardworking woman with a true gift in the kitchen. She loves her work and always gives her everything in order to continue improving herself. She knows that it is in this way only that she will achieve success in the future. She always remains at the head of her competition and each time increases her demand. For this reason she wants to increase her production and is requesting a loan from Integral which will allow her to buy corn, rice, cheese, beans, and pork cracklings, among other items. Blanca has the ability and loan, and knows that she will be able to complete the payments all the while giving her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn, rice, cheese, beans, and pork cracklings.

loans.name: Dolores Evelio

texts.es: Dolores Evelio, es conocido en su comunidad por ser muy trabajador, honesto y  responsable. Actualmente vive con su esposa, con la cual tuvo 3 hijos, quienes ya viven fuera de casa. Evelio, a pesar de contar únicamente con educación primaria, ha sido el soporte económico de su familia, gracias a sus conocimientos de agricultor se ha dedicado a cultivar maíz, frijol y café. A sus 57 años de edad, Evelio aún ejerce la agricultura, por lo que ha decidido solicitar este préstamo a INTEGRAL para la compra de materiales e insumos agrícolas (abonos, semillas, fertilizantes, etc.) y así sembrar 2 manzanas  de maíz y 2.5 manzanas  de frijol, lo que le permitirá continuar siendo el soporte económico de su hogar.
texts.en: Dolores Evelio is known in his community for being very hardworking, honest and responsible. He lives with his wife, and the have three children who have all moved away from home. Evelio, despite only having primary education, has been the economic support for his family; thanks to his knowledge of agriculture, he has been able to cultivate corn, beans and coffee. At 57 years old, Evelio still works in agriculture, so he has decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL so he can buy materials and supplies (fertilisers, seeds etc.) and plant two plots of corn and two and a half of beans, which will allow him to carry on being the financial provider for his household.

loans.use: To buy fertilisers, seeds etc.

loans.name: Asuncion

texts.en:
Asuncion is 78 years old and married with 7 children.

Asuncion works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 19,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell.

Asuncion has borrowed and repaid 14 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 35 years and also earns an income from farming sugarcane.

Asuncion aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business buying and selling dried fish in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing 25,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of dried fish to sell for her business of buying and selling dried fish.

Lydia has been in this business for 12 years. Lydia earns more income from a poultry business.

Lydia has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of dried fish to sell

loans.name: Rosa Del Carmen

texts.es: Rosa del Carmen de treinta y siete años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia, ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz desde hace ya varios años, se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en el ámbito de la agricultura y eso le ayuda a siempre obtener muy buenas cosechas, tiene mucha clientela pues todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad y lo vende a precios accesibles además de un servicio inigualable; Rosa es una mujer visionaria con muchas ganas de superarse, sabe que solo trabajando arduamente y dando lo mejor de uno mismo se puede llegar al éxito, su arma más valiosa es la entrega a su labor, en este periodo de siembra Rosa quiere aumentar la producción pero necesita capital para invertir por eso le solicita a  INTEGRAL un  crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, fertilizante, herbicidas, insecticidas, etc. Rosa tiene buenas referencias de pago y tiene de respaldo el trabajo de su esposo, por eso ella tiene la seguridad de que de esta forma podrá saldar la deuda del financiamiento y al mismo tiempo logrará darle a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Rosa de Carmen is thirty-seven years old. She lives with her life partner and children in their own home. For a number of years now she has been earning her living cultivating corn. She has a lot of experience in agriculture, and this helps her to always reap very good harvests. She has many customers since everything she produces is of excellent quality and sold at accessible prices and because she provides unbeatable customer service. 

Rosa is a visionary women with a strong desire to improve herself. She knows that success can only be arrived at through hard work and putting in one’s best. Her most valuable weapon is her hard work.

This seeding period Rosa wants to increase production, but she needs capital to invest. She is asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy corn seed, fertilizer, herbicides, insecticides etc. 

Rosa has good payment references and has the support of her husband’s job. For this reason she is sure that she will be able to repay the loan debt and, at the same time, be able to provide her family with a better life.

loans.use: to buy corn seed, fertilizer, herbicides and insecticides.

loans.name: María Maribel

texts.es: María Maribel de 48 años de edad, vive con su esposo y su hija de 17 años en casa de habitación alquilada, donde también funciona su negocio: una tienda de granos básicos, bebidas gaseosas y endulzadas, golosinas, productos de higiene personal y limpieza. La tienda cuenta con una ubicación de fácil acceso. María únicamente lleva 3 años administrando la tienda, pero el negocio tiene 30 años funcionando y cuenta con una buena cartera de clientes, generando altas ventas mensuales. María necesita un préstamo para invertir en granos básicos, productos lácteos y bebidas para la tienda, de modo que no haya escasez de productos y sus clientes sigan siendo leales. Ella espera que al incrementar la lista de productos para la venta, generará los ingresos suficientes para solventar las necesidades económicas del negocio y su familia.
texts.en: María Maribel is 48 years old. She lives with her husband and her 17-year-old daughter in a rented house, which is also the site of her business: a store selling basic staple foods, sweetened carbonated drinks, snacks, personal hygiene products and cleaning supplies. The store has a location which is easy to access. María has run the store for only 3 years, but the business has been operating for 30 years, and it has a good customer base, generating high monthly sales. María needs a loan to invest in basic staple foods, dairy products and beverages for her store, so that there is no shortage of products and her customers can continue being loyal. She hopes that by increasing the inventory of products for sale she will be able to generate enough income to cover the economic needs of the business and of her family.

loans.use: to buy basic staple foods, dairy products, beverages, and other items for her store.

loans.name: Olivia

texts.es: Olivia es conocida por sus vecinos como una mujer trabajadora, responsable y honesta. Ella es la encargada de proveer ingresos a su familia, por lo que a sus 54 años de edad, se dedica a cultivar maíz, a la crianza de cerdos y aves de corral. Cada año, es necesario invertir en insumos para el cultivo de maíz, los cuales se recuperarán al recolectar y vender la cosecha. Este año, deberá adquirir materiales e insumos agrícolas (fertilizantes, semillas, hervicidas, etc.), por lo que ha decidido solicitar este préstamo a INTEGRAL que le permita hacer dicha inversión, y poder sembrar 1.5 manzanas de terreno con maíz, con lo cual espera obtener ingresos para el sustento de su familia y poco a poco ir mejorando sus condiciones de vida ya que vive en condiciones muy humildes.
texts.en:
Olivia is known by her neighbours as a hardworking, responsible and honest woman. She is responsible for bringing in the income for her family and so, at 54 years of age, she earns her living growing corn and raising pigs and poultry. Each year she needs to invest in the purchase of supplies to cultivate corn. She recovers the investment upon reaping and selling the harvest. 

This year, she will need to buy materials and agricultural supplies (fertilizers, seeds, herbicides etc). She is asking INTEGRAL for a loan so that she can make this investment. This will enable her to sow 1.5 acres of land with corn with which she hopes to obtain income to support her family and slowly improve her living conditions, since she lives in very humble conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, seeds, herbicides etc.

loans.name: Candelario

texts.es: Candelario, de 64 años de edad, vive en casa de habitación junto a su esposa de 64 años. Sus hijos crecieron y se fueron a Estados Unidos a buscar mejores oportunidades de vida, por lo que pueden apoyar a sus padres enviando una pequeña remesa mensualmente. Para lograr que los ingresos que percibe  cubran las necesidades básicas, y debido a que ni su esposa ni él están en edad para salir a buscar un trabajo fuera del hogar, Candelario ha iniciado a comercializar en su casa productos alimenticios de primera necesidad como granos básicos, y artículos de limpieza. Asimismo, debido a que la venta de abarrotes no alcanza para satisfacer las necesidades del hogar, también comercializa productos de ferretería. Por ello, Candelario solicita este préstamo para invertir en artículos  como tubos de pvc, clavos, cemento y otros productos ferreteros, que le permitan alcanzar seguridad y estabilidad económica para él y su esposa. Expresa estar muy agradecido con esta institución ya que en el pasado le brindo su ayuda cuando la necesito.
texts.en:
Candelario, age 64, lives at home with his 64 year old wife.  His children grew up and went to the United States to look for better life opportunities.  The children are able to support their parents by sending a small monthly remittance. 

In order to get the income to cover basic expenses, and due to the fact that neither he or his wife are of an age to leave looking for work outside of the home, Candelario started selling staple grocery store items in his house.  He sells things like basic grains and cleaning products.

Because selling grocery items does not cover the household necessities, he also sells hardware products.  Candelario therefore needs this loan to buy things like PVC pipes, nails, cement, and other hardware products.  These will allow him to achieve security and financial stability for him and for his wife.

He says that he is very grateful to this institution because in the past it has given him support when he needed it.

loans.use: to buy things like PVC pipes, nails, cement, and other hardware products.

loans.name: José Alfonso

texts.es: José Alfonso, es padre soltero de 3 hijos, menores de edad, los cuales ya no viven con él sin embargo les ayuda económicamente todos los meses. José, tiene 51 años de edad. Desde hace 2 años vive en casa alquilada, donde ha establecido una tapicería, a lo cual se dedica desde hace 22 años. Actualmente cuenta con una buena clientela para su trabajo, pues ha demostrado ser responsable y eficiente. Trabaja para varios hoteles del país, dando mantenimiento a sus muebles. José necesita un préstamo para invertir en materia prima e insumos de tapicería (hilos, telas, pegas, madera, etc.) y así poder realizar los trabajos que sus clientes le han encomendado. La inversión que realizará será recuperada al entregar los trabajos de reparación de tapizado, y los ingresos que esto le genere servirán para su manutención y cobertura de servicios básicos. Confía que con la ayuda de esta institución, INTEGRAL, logrará mejorar su condición de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
José Alfonso is single and has three minor children.  The children do not live with him, but nonetheless he helps them financially every month.  José is 51 years old.  He has lived in a rented house for two years, and he has established an upholstery business at the house.  He has devoted himself to this work for 22 years.

He currently has good clientele for his work.  He has demonstrated himself to be responsible and efficient.  He works for various hotels in the country, and he provides maintenance to the furniture.

José needs a loan to invest in buying raw materials and upholstery supplies (thread, fabric, glue, and wood, etc.).  This way he will be able to do the work that his customers have entrusted to him.  The investment he will make will be recuperated upon delivering the upholstery repair jobs.

The income that this will generate will be used for his living expenses and to cover the basic services.  He is confident that with the help of this institution, Integral, he will manage to improve the living conditions for himself and for his family.

loans.use: to buy thread, fabric, glue, and wood, etc.

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es: Jose Antonio, vive con sus 4 hijos, de los cuales 2 están estudiando y los demás ya dan un aporte para los gastos del hogar. A sus 61 años de edad, José aún es el responsable de la situación económica de su familia, por lo que ha fundado una pequeña tienda en su casa de habitación, donde comercializa granos básicos, huevos, dulces, golosinas, bebidas gaseosas y endulzadas, junto a otros productos de higiene personal y limpieza. Debido a las dificultades económicas de la familia, José ha decidido hacer este préstamo, que le permita invertir en nueva y mayor cantidad de mercadería para la venta como: bebidas, golosinas, aceite, arroz, azúcar, y otros artículos que sean atractivos para los clientes. Con lo cual incrementará sus ventas e ingresos mensuales para dar cobertura a los gastos de alimentación, vivienda y educación de la familia.
texts.en:
Jose Antonio lives with his four children. Two of them are studying and the others already make a contribution to the household expenses. At 61 years of age, Jose is still responsible for the family’s financial situation. For this reason he has set up a small shop in his house, where he sells basic grains, eggs, sweets, candies, soft drinks and other personal hygiene and cleaning products. 

Due to the family’s financial difficulties, Jose has decided to ask for this loan which will allow him to invest in a new and broader range of merchandise to sell such as drinks, sweets, oil, rice, sugar and other items which will be attractive to his customers. This way he will increase his sales and monthly income so that he can cover his family’s food, housing and educational expenses.

loans.use: to buy drinks, sweets, oil, rice, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Ricardo Antonio

texts.es: Ricardo Antonio de cincuenta y cinco años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos; él se dedica al cultivo de café, pero también al cultivo de maíz, frijol y maicillo, tiene varios años de experiencia  en la agricultura y siempre ha obtenido muy buenas cosechas, es un comerciante muy conocido en las zonas aledañas al terreno donde siembra, las personas lo prefieren porque tiene producto de calidad y lo vende a precio accesible además él siempre está al servicio de la clientela; Ricardo es un hombre de metas dispuesto a salir adelante, está decidido a aprovechar cada oportunidad que se le presenta, en la siembra pasada tuvo algunas perdidas y ahora quiere recuperarse por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de café, maíz, frijol y maicillo, herbicida, fertilizante entre otros; Ricardo Antonio tiene todo el apoyo de su familia para sacar adelante esta idea, él tiene un buen record crediticio y se hace totalmente responsable de cancelar el financiamiento además tiene la esperanza que podrá llevar a su hogar mayor seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Ricardo Antonio is fifty five years old, he lives with his life partner and children; He makes a living cultivating coffee, but also he grows corn, beans and millet.
 
He has many years of experience in agriculture and he has always gotten very good crops. He is a well-known tradesman in the neighbouring zones to his land patch, people prefers him because he has good quality produce and he sells it at a good price, and he is always there to help his customers.
Ricardo is a man who has goals and who is driven to get ahead in life, he is determined to take on every chance that arises.

During his last crop he had some loses and now he wants to recover from that, that is why he is requesting a loan with INTEGRAL so he can buy coffee seed, corn seed, bean seed and millet seed, weed killer fertilizer among other things.

Ricardo has the full support of his family to bring this idea forward, he has a good credit record and he is taking full responsibility for paying off his loan; he also has the hope that he will be able to provide greater economic security for his household.

loans.use: tu buy coffee, corn, bean and millet seeds; weed killer and fertilizer

loans.name: María Francisca

texts.es: María Francisca, es una mujer salvadoreña pensionada, que a sus 61 años de edad y pese a estar un poco enferma, debe trabajar al lado de su hijo y nieto, con quienes vive, para lograr que los ingresos familiares sean suficientes para solventar las necesidades básicas del hogar. María es una mujer trabajadora, responsable y sencilla, que vende granos básicos, frutas, verduras y huevos en su casa. La ubicación es muy accesible ya que se encuentra en una zona de fácil acceso. María  es una micro empresaria que busca tener acceso a este préstamo que le permita impulsar su negocio, invirtiendo en la adquisición de más frutas, verduras y otros productos alimenticios.  Ella prevé que, si logra invertir más en su negocio podrá atraer más clientes, y así obtener mayores ingresos que le permitan una mejor solvencia económica.
texts.en:
María Francisca is a retired Salvadorian woman.  She is 61 years old, and in spite of being a little sick, she needs to work a long side her son and grandson, with whom she lives.  She does this so that the family income will be enough to cover the basic household necessities.

María is a very hard-working, responsible, and unassuming woman.  She sells basic grains, fruits, vegetables, and eggs at her house.  Her location is very accessible because it is in an area that is easy to access.

María is a small businesswoman who is looking for a loan that will allow her to boost her business.  She will use the loan to buy more fruits, vegetables, and other food products.  She predicts that if she invests more in her business she will be able to attract more customers.  This way she will get greater income, which will allow her to have better financial solvency.

loans.use: to buy fruits, vegetables, eggs, and grains, etc.

loans.name: Ana Lisseth

texts.es:
Ana, solicita un préstamo para seguir trabajando con su venta de antojitos comprara plátanos, azucar, aceite, condimentos y  maíz para hacer las tostadas la pupusas, el atol y las enchiladas, que son los productos que ofrece a sus clientes.
El efecto que tuvo con el préstamo anterior le aumento la producción atendiendo a mas clientela porque penetro a unas nuevas zonas de mercado. Con esto a aumentado sus ingresos para su hogar.
texts.en: Ana is requesting a loan to continue working selling snacks. She will buy bananas, sugar, oil, condiments and maize to make the flatbread, atol (a popular drink) and enchiladas that are the products that she offers to her customers. The effect that she had with her last loan was an increase in production, attending to more customers because she penetrated new areas of the market. With this, she has expanded her income for her home.

loans.use: to purchase bananas, sugar, oil, condiments and maize.

loans.name: Jose Salvador

texts.es:
José , se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo pues por su trabaja necesita iniciar la nueva siembra de maíz y frijol, utilizara estos fondos para la compra de abonos y herbicidas que son los que le permiten proteger y fortalecer los cultivos.
El considera que el préstamo anterior le ayudo para la anterior siembra y el mejoramiento de su vivienda, estando ahora en una vivienda mas segura junto a su familia.
texts.en:
José has decided to get a new loan because he needs to start the new corn and bean planting for his job.  He will use these funds to buy fertilizer and herbicide to protect and strengthen his crops.

He thinks the previous loan helped him for the previous planting and for the improvement of his home because now he and his family are in a more secure home.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and herbicide.

loans.name: Alexis Bladimir

texts.es:
Alexis, solicita un préstamo para invertirlo en el cultivo de maíz y frijol, invirtiéndolo en el pago del alquiler de la tierra y en la compra de abono y herbicidas esto le servirá para poder comenzar su trabajo del cual espera le de buenos frutos.
El préstamo anterior también le ayudo para comprarse los insumos, logrando recoger una buena cosecha con la que ayudo en la alimentación de su familia.
texts.en: Alexis is requesting a loan to invest it in the cultivation of maize and beans, investing in the payment of renting the land and purchasing fertilizer and herbicides. This will serve him to be able to begin his job from which he hopes to gain good fruit. The previous loan also helped him to buy inputs, successfully gathering a good harvest which helped him feed his family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and herbicides.

loans.name: Marleni

texts.es:
Marleni, necesita un préstamo para el fortalecimiento de tu negocio comprándose frutas y verdura frescas para atender a la clientela, se surtirá de pepinos, zanahorias, cebollas, tomates, fresas, manzanas, sandia, esto le ayudara a mejorar y a crecer en el mercado.
Con el préstamo anterior logro también surtir el negocio, de sus ganancias ha mejorado su vivienda para tener un hogar mas seguro y en mejores condiciones.
texts.en: Marleni needs a loan to strengthen her business buying fresh fruit and vegetables to attend to her customers. She will stock up on cucumbers, carrots, onions, tomatoes, strawberries, apples, watermelon. This will help to improve and grow in the market. With the previous loan, she was also able to stock her business. From her earnings, she has improved her house in order to have a safer home that's in better condition.

loans.use: to purchase cucumbers, carrots, onions, tomatoes, strawberries, apples, watermelon.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.es:
Nelly, solicita un nuevo préstamo para continuar invirtiendo en su panadería comprara los materiales como el azúcar la harina, huevos, levadura, leña y gas que son los necesarios para la producción.
El préstamo anterior también le permitió a Nelly comprase la materia prima necesaria para la elaboración del pan con lo que a estado trabajando en este periodo, sus condiciones familiares considera que también han sido mejores ofreciéndole a su familia una mejor estabilidad.
texts.en: Nelly is requesting a new loan to continue investing in her bakery. She will buy materials like sugar, flour, eggs, yeast, wood and gas, that are necessary for production. The previous loan also allowed Nelly to buy the raw materials necessary to make bread with which she has worked during this time. Her family situation has also improved offering her family better stability.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, flour, eggs, yeast, wood and gas.

loans.name: Nelson David

texts.es:
Nelson, necesita invertir para la productividad de granos básicos pues este a sido el trabajo que le a ayudado para seguir adelante con su familia, comprara 1500 plantas de chile, abono, foliares, semilla de maíz, para poder iniciar su siembra.
Con el préstamo anterior considera que mejoro su producción con la cual logro tener ventas para los ingresos de su familia, actualmente todos gozan de salud.
texts.en: Nelson needs to invest for the productivity of basic grains since this has been his work that helped continue getting his family ahead. He will buy 1,500 chilli plants, fertilizer, leaves, maize seed to be able to start planting. The previous loan improved his production with which he managed to have sales for his family's income. Currently, all of them enjoy good health.

loans.use: to purchase 1500 chili plants, fertilizer, leaves and maize seed.

loans.name: Lilian Marisol

texts.es:
Lilian, esta solicitando un nuevo préstamo para la compra de productos de primera necesidad, para surtir el negocio, comprándose aceite, arroz, sal, azúcar, detergentes, gaseosas y otros productos que son necesarios para poder brindar una buena atención a los clientes.
El efecto que tuvo con el préstamo anterior fue positivo, mejorando el inventario de la tienda, esto le ha ayudado a mejorar la economía de su familia.
texts.en: Lilian is requesting a new loan to buy basic necessity products to stock her business, buying oil, rice, salt, sugar, detergents, sodas and other products that are necessary to be able to provide good attention to her customers. The effect of her previous loan was positive, improving the inventory of her store. This helped her to improve her family's financial situation.

loans.use: to purchase oil, rice, salt, sugar, detergents, and sodas.

loans.name: Jose Mauricio

texts.es:
José, trabaja en el cultivo de maíz y frijol, es padre de dos jóvenes de 18 y 23 años de edad,  vive en casa propia con su familia, él aprendió el trabajo agrícola por su padre, tiene 15 años de estar en esta actividad.
El está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de materiales agrícolas, porque se dispone a sembrar, utilizando  semilla mejorada, abono, herbicidas  con el objetivo de tener mejores resultados, este préstamo  será un gran aporte para José, pues contara con los recursos económicos que le permitan realizar la siembra y tener una abundante cosecha.
El objetivo de José es mantener las buenas condiciones de su familia, darle continuidad a su trabajo para tener una mejor solvencia.
texts.en:
Jose works growing corn and beans. He is the father of two young people who are 18 and 23 years old. He lives in his own house with his family. He learnt about agricultural work from his father and has been working in this area for 15 years. 

He is asking for a loan to buy agricultural materials so that he can sow using better seed, manure and herbicides to obtain better results. This loan will be a big contribution for Jose, since it will provide him with the financial resources to allow him to seed and have a big harvest. 

Jose’s objective is to maintain his family’s good conditions and to continue in his work so that he can improve his solvency.

loans.use: to buy materials: better seeds, manure and herbicides.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
María, quiere surtir el negocio para esto solicita un nuevo préstamo que le permita mejorar su tienda y la venta de ropa y productos de belleza de revistas, comprándose blusas, faldas, pantalones, con esto espera seguir creciendo en el mercado y siendo mas productiva, ya que contara con mayor variedad de productos.
El efecto con el préstamo anterior fue positivo, ya que mejoro la tienda con esto esta motivada para seguir trabajando con préstamos, ya que también su familia se encuentra mejor, ha comprado algunos bienes del hogar.
texts.en: Maria wants to stock her business for which she is requesting a new loan that allows her to improve her shop and sell clothing and magazine beauty products, buying blouses, skirts and pants. With this, she hopes to continue growing in the market and being more productive since she has a greater variety of products. The effect of her last loan was positive since it improved her store. With this she is motivated to keep working with the loans since also her family is better. She has bought some household goods.

loans.use: to purchase blouses, skirts, and pants.

loans.name: Edilberto

texts.es:
Edilberto, solicita un nuevo préstamo para seguir cultivando, ya que se dispone a trabajar en 6 manzanas de terreno, donde sembrara maíz, pipián y ajonjolí, este préstamo lo utilizara en la compra de abono, herbicidas, pago de mozos y preparación del terreno, esto será una gran ayuda para seguir trabajando.
El efecto que tuvo con el préstamo anterior fue positivo, pues hizo las respectivas actividades en la siembra de sus productos, este buen avance y aprovechamiento de los préstamos le esta dando un mayor estabilidad en sus cosechas y su familia esta mejor.
texts.en: Edilberto is requesting a new loan to continue farming since he is available to work on 6 acres of land where he plants maize, pipián y sesame. This loan will be used to purchase fertilizer, herbicides, to pay workers and prepare the land. This will be a great help to continue working. The effect that the previous loan had was positive since he did the respective activities in planting his products. This good development and use of loans is giving him greater stability and his family is better.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicides, pay workers and prepare the land.

loans.name: Maria Candelaria

texts.es:
María, solicita un préstamo porque esta iniciando su nuevo cultivo de maíz para lo que necesite comprarse el abono y semilla mejorada, para poder realizar esta labor que le ayuda con la alimentación del hogar. 
El efecto que tubo con el préstamo anterior le ayudo con su cosecha, tambien logro la compra de ganado, con esto ella ha podido tener una mejor solvencia economica también su situación ha ido mejorando en su familia.
texts.en:
María is requesting a loan because she is starting her new corn crop, for which she needs to buy fertilizer and improved seed to be able to do this work that helps her feed her household.

The previous loan had the effect of helping her with her harvest.  She also managed to buy cattle, with which she has been able to have better economic solvency.  Also, her family's situation has been improving.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and improved seed.

loans.name: Manuel Antonio

texts.es:
Manuel, necesita mas capital  económico para poder comprarse los insumos agrícolas, como el abono, insecticidas, pesticidas y semilla mejorada, pues esta iniciando un nuevo trabajo en el cultivo de maíz.
El efecto que tubo con el préstamo anterior fue que le permitió tener todo lo necesario para realizar su trabajo con lo cual a mejorado sus condiciones en su negocio viviendo mejor con su familia.
texts.en:
Manuel needs more economic capital to be able to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizer, insecticide, pesticide, and improved seed because he is beginning a new job growing corn.

The effect of the previous loan was that it allowed him to have everything he needed to do his job, with which he has improved his business conditions, living better with his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, insecticide, pesticide, and improved seed.

loans.name: Francisco Antonio

texts.es:
Francisco, esta solicitando un nuevo préstamo para comprarse dos terneros, esto le ayudara a aumentar su ganadería y a tener oportunidades futuras de generar nuevos ingresos.
El considera que el préstamo anterior le permitió crecer y tener mejores condiciones e ingresos por medio de sus cosechas, con su familia también considera que sus condiciones están mejorando a través de los préstamos.
texts.en:
Francisco is requesting a new loan to buy two calves.  This will help him expand his livestock and have future opportunities for generating additional income.

He considers that the previous loan allowed him to grow and have better conditions and income through his harvest.  He also believes that his family conditions are improving through the loans.

loans.use: to buy two calves.

loans.name: Luis Alfredo

texts.es:
Luis, quiere seguir creciendo en su negocio y seguir atendiendo a sus clientes por eso solicita un nuevo financiamiento para invertirlo en concentrado para los cerdos y algunos utensilios para el destazo, con esto lograra tener en buenas condiciones su negocio y lo necesario para realizar su negocio.
El efecto que tubo con el préstamo anterior a sido positivo pues lo utilizo para la siembra y en el destazo a tenido mayor demanda; en su familia su situación económica a mejorado en gran parte.
texts.en: Luis wants to continue growing in his business and serving his customers. This is why he is asking for a new loan to invest in feed for his pigs and some slaughtering equipment. With this, he will succeed in keeping his business in good condition and will have what he needs to carry out his business. The effect of the previous loan has been positive, since he used it for planting, and he has had more demand for slaughtering. His family's economic situation has improved a great deal.

loans.use: to purchase feed for his pigs and slaughtering equipment

loans.name: Maricela Elizabeth

texts.es:
Maricela, necesita invertir nuevamente en la siembra de una manzana de frijol y de maíz por esta situación esta solicitando el préstamo ya que a través de el lograra comprar abonos, herbicidas y otros fertilizantes necesarios para el cultivo de maíz y frijol.
El préstamo anterior le ayudo a Maricela en la compra también de los insumos anteriores de los cuales obtuvo una buena cosecha mejorando sus condiciones en el hogar.
texts.en:
Maricela needs to invest once again in sowing around 1.5 acres of beans and corn. For this reason, she is requesting the loan so that she can buy manure, herbicide and other fertilisers necessary for growing corn and beans. 

The previous loan also helped Maricela to buy similar supplies resulting in a good harvest and an improvement in her household situation.

loans.use: to buy manure, herbicides and other fertilisers.

loans.name: Jose Ermis

texts.es:
José, solicita un préstamo porque esta iniciando su nuevo cultivo comprándose el abono y los fertilizantes necesarios para proteger y fortalecer su siembra de maíz y frijol esto le ayudara a continuar en la agricultura ya que depende de esta actividad.
Para José estos préstamos han sido un gran apoyo ya que su trabajo agrícola a mejorado con el anterior logro obtener una buena producción para el sustento de su familia.
texts.en:
José is asking for a loan because he is starting his new crops and is buying the manure and fertilizers necessary to protect and strengthen his corn and bean crops. This will help him to continue farming, since he depends on this work.

For José, these loans have been a great support, since his agricultural work has improved with the previous one. He was able to get a good harvest to sustain his family.

loans.use: to purchase manure and fertilizer

loans.name: Fidel Angel

texts.es:
Fidel, esta iniciando su nuevo cultivo de maíz y de frijol por eso se decidió por un nuevo préstamo para comprarse los materiales necesarios como el abono y los herbicidas que le ayudan a fortalecer y a prevenir de las plagas.
El préstamo anterior le ayudo a Fidel para realizar el cultivo con lo que logro obtener una buena producción para el sustento de su familia y para vender una parte de ella.
texts.en:
Fidel is beginning a new cultivation of corn and beans, and for this reason he has decided to request a new loan to buy the necessary material such as manure and herbicides which help him to strengthen his crop and prevent pests. 

The previous loan helped Fidel to carry out his cultivation resulting in a good crop, part of which was used to feed his family and part to sell.

loans.use: to buy manure and herbicides.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Saul Alberto

texts.es:
Saúl, quiere seguir trabajando con préstamos ya que le permiten mantener un trabajo y fuente de ingresos para su familia invirtiendo en la compra de mariscos como pescado, conchas, camarones.
Saúl considera que con estos préstamos a mejorado su ventas a logrado pagar sus deudas y cubrir las necesidades de su hogar, también en este periodo mejoro algunas partes de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Saúl wants to continue working with loans because they allow him to stay in business and keep a source of income for his family investing in the purchase of seafood like fish, clams and shrimp.

Saúl feels that with these loans his sales have improved and he’s managed to pay his debts and cover household needs.  He’s also managed to make improvements to some parts of his house during this period.

loans.use: to buy seafood.

loans.name: Mariela Elizabeth

texts.es:
Mariela tiene 30 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposo, tiene 4 hijos y vive en la Ciudad de Puerto Cortes.
Mariela su fuente de ingresos es una pequeña pulpería que estableció hace 3 años por sus propios medios. En su negocio vende granos básicos  como harina, arroz, manteca, frijoles, golosinas (churros, galletas,) refrescos etc. Con las ganancias del negocio ha podido solventar algunos gastos del hogar.
Ella esta solicitando a Odef un préstamo de 15,000 lempiras para abastecerse de producto como granos basicos, golosinas, carnes, refrescos etc. Con esta inversión ella podrá aumentar las ganancias y ofrecer más productos a los clientes.
Su meta es hacer crecer poco a poco  su negocio y así darles a sus hijos mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Mariela, age 30, is in a common law marriage.  She lives with her husband and four children in the city of Puerto Cortes.

Mariela’s source of income is from a small grocery store that she established three years ago in order to get her own resources.  In her business she sells basic grocery items like flour, rice, lard, beans, sweets (churros and cookies), and soft drinks, etc.  With the income from the business she has been able to cover some of the household expenses.

She is requesting a loan for 15,000 lempiras from ODEF in order to stock up on products like basic grains, sweets, meat, and soft drinks, etc.  With this investment she will be able to increase her income and offer more products to her customers.

Her goal is to make her business grow little by little.  This way she will give her children a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, beans, rice, lard, corn flour, sweets, meat, and soft drinks, etc. in order to stock her buisiness.

loans.name: Juan Zamora

texts.es:
Juan, solicita un préstamo para la inversión del negocio comprándose productos frescos, como papas, chiles, tomates, cebollas, que le ayudaran a estar preparado para atender la demanda en la elaboracion de comida, esto le ayudar porque sus ingresos dependen de este negocio, con el que espera crecer.
Con el préstamo anterior tuvo una buena experiencia con la que pudo cancelar las cuotas de este préstamo y cubrir las necesidades del hogar, esto el motivo para seguir trabajando con préstamos.
texts.en: Juan is requesting a loan to invest in his business. He will buy fresh products like potatoes, chilis, tomatoes and onions, which will help him to be prepared to attend to the demand in food production. This will help him because his income depends on this business, which he hopes will grow.  With the previous loan he had a good experience in which he was able to pay off the installments of the loan and take care of the necessities of his home. This motivated him to continue working with loans.

loans.use: to buy potatoes, chilis, tomatoes, onions

loans.name: Jose Ernesto

texts.es:
Jose de 60 años de edad, es casado, tiene 4 hijos y vive con su familia en una comunidad de Yorito, Yoro.
Don Jose se dedicaba solo a la agricultura, pero quería poner en práctica su habilidad de realizar trabajos de metal, hace ya 25 años decidió establecer el negocio en su casa, donde fabrica silos metálicos para almacenar granos básicos, chimeneas para hornillas, cubetas metálicas, candiles y todo tipo de hojalatería. Esta solicitando el sexto préstamo a ODEF para comprar la materia prima como lamina, estaño, pinturas, acido muriático, carbón y cautines para soldar, para la fabricación de silos y hojalatería. Con este préstamo ayudara a aumentar el inventario y vender más. Su meta es alquilar un maquina industrial para realizar mas rápido los productos y obtener más ganancias para darle mejor nivel de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
José, 60, is married and has four children; he lives with his family in a community in Yorito, Yoro.

José used to work just in agriculture but he wanted to put into practice his metalworking skills so 25 years ago he set up a business at home where he manufactures metal silos to store basic grains, stove pipes, metal pails, oil lamps and all sorts of metalwork.  

He’s asking ODEF for his sixth loan to buy raw materials like sheets of metal, tin, paint, muriatic acid, carbon and soldering irons to manufacture the silos and metalwork.

This loan will help increase inventory and to sell more.  His goal is to lease an industrial machine to produce his wares more quickly and to earn more profits to give his family a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy raw materials.

loans.name: Boanerges Arcides

texts.es:
Boanerges, solicita un préstamo para invertirlo en la temporada de mayo en su pequeño restauran comprándose materia prima para prepara sus menús en variedades como carnes, marisco, pollo, condimentos aceites, arroz, vegetales, bebidas, para mantener diversidad de alimentos en el negocio.
El tuvo un efecto positivo con el préstamo anterior mejorando su producción atrayendo más clientes al negocio y estabilizándose más con la competencia.
texts.en:
Boanerges is requesting a loan to invest in the May season in his small restaurant by buying various ingredients to prepare his menus such as meat, seafood, chicken, condiments, oils, rice, vegetables and drinks in order to maintain a variety of dishes in his business.  

The previous loan had a positive effect on him, improving his production, attracting more clients to the business and establishing his business more in relation to the competition.

loans.use: to buy meat, seafood, chicken, condiments, oils, rice, vegetables and drinks.

loans.name: Beldis Yolanda

texts.es:
Beldis tiene  43 años de edad, viven en unión libre y tiene 2 hijos, vive en el Municipio de San Juan Pueblo, Tela.
Doña Beldis, le gusta mucho la belleza, se propuso a estudiar en una academia de belleza, para cumplir su sueño de tener su propio negocio. Hace 3 años que lo estableció y ofrece los servicios de corte, alisado, secado, manicure, tintes e iluminaciones y también vende productos como champú, tratamientos para el cabello, cremas etc. a este negocio ella le dedica 8 horas diarias. Lo que motivó es el deseo de sentirse útil aportando a la unidad familiar. 
El préstamo que solicita a ODEF es de 15,000 lempiras es para invertir en productos de belleza, tratamientos como la Queratina, cremas etc. para uso en el salón y para vender a los clientes que necesitan algún producto de estos. 
Su meta es llegar a tener un local propio  y más grande y tener más empleados que atiendan la demanda de clientes y tener su propia casa.
texts.en:
Beldis, 43, lives in a common law relationship and has two children; she lives in the municipality of San Juan Pueblo, Tela.

Beldis likes beauty very much so she determined to study beauty in an academy to reach her dream of having her own business.  Three years ago she opened it and she offers services like haircuts, hair straightening, hair drying, manicure, hair coloring and highlighting; she also sells products like shampoo, hair treatments, creams, etc.  She spends 8 hours per day at work.  What motivated her was the wish to feel useful contributing to the family unit.

The 15,000 lempira loan she’s asking ODEF for is to buy beauty products, treatments like keratin, creams, etc. to use in the salon and also to sell to customers who may need one of these products.

Her goal is to have a larger locale of her own eventually and to have more employees to respond to customer demand and to have her own house.

loans.use: to buy beauty products.

loans.name: Cruz

texts.es:
Cruz, solicita un nuevo préstamo para seguir cultivando de maíz en esta ocasión aumentara el terreno en una manzana mas también comprara mayor cantidad de abono, semilla mejorada, herbicidas y la preparación del terreno esperando aumentar la producción en esta temporada.
Con el préstamo anterior tubo un efecto positivo ya que realizo el cultivo y un pozo para regadillo. En su familia todos se han mantenido estables sus ingresos y alimentación han mejorado.
texts.en: Cruz is requesting a new loan to continue farming corn. This time he will increase the land size by approximately 1.68 acres.  He will also buy a larger quantity of fertilizer, improved seeds, herbicides and land preparation. He is hoping to increase production this season. He had a positive effect with the previous loan since he achieved production of the crops and created a well for irrigation.  In his family everyone has maintained stable incomes and diets have improved.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, improved seeds, herbicides and land preparation

loans.name: Ana Julia

texts.es:
Ana Julia tiene 49 años de edad, es soltera con 4 hijos, vive en una aldea cerca de la ciudad de Puerto Cortes junto a su hija mayor.

Doña Ana Julia, siempre se ha dedicado al comercio, ella vendía todo tipo de mercadería, y hace 5 años se dedico al negocio de venta de comidas ya que es rentable. Anexado a su casa hizo un local donde vende refrescos, golosinas, comidas como pollo con tajadas, chuletas fritas, tacos, y otros. Esta solicitando un préstamo de 21,000.00 Lempiras para comprar insumos para elaborar comidas y golosinas, refrescos, jugos etc. surtiendo mas su negocio para obtener ingresos que cubran los gastos familiares. Su meta es seguir trabajando en su negocio ya que tiene buena demanda y superarse cada día mas y mejorar la calidad de vida familiar.
texts.en:
Ana Julia, 49, is single with four children; she lives in a village near the city of Puerto Cortes with her oldest daughter.

Ana Julia has always been a merchant.  She used to sell all sorts of merchandise and five years ago decided to sell food because it’s profitable.  She built a locale onto her house where she sells soft-drinks, snacks and food like chicken with fried banana, fried chops, tacos and others.  

She’s asking for a 21,000 lempira loan to buy ingredients and supplies to prepare the food and snacks, soft-drinks, juice, etc.  Her goal is to continue working in her business since demand is good and to improve more each day and to improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and supplies.

loans.name: Norma Hilda

texts.es:
Doña Norma de 52 años de edad, es soltera con 3 hijos, vive en la Ciudad de Puerto Cortes junto a dos hijos.
Ella anteriormente vendía pan y donas, pero el negocio de la comida es más rentable y decidió establecerlo hace 6 años, donde vende carnes de res y de cerdo, desayunos y cenas. Esta inversión le ayudara a crecer y darle un mayor desarrollo al negocio. El préstamo que solicita de 21,000.00 Lempiras es para surtir de producto como carnes y comprar los insumos necesarios para la elaboración de comidas. Su plan es atender bien a sus clientes ofreciendo siempre buena calidad para obtener ingresos que le ayuden a mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Norma, 52, is single with three children; she lives in the city of Puerto Cortes with two children.

She used to sell bread and donuts but the food business is more profitable so six years ago decided to go into it; she sells beef and pork, breakfasts and suppers.  This investment will help her grow and develop the business more.

The 21,000 lempira loan she’s requesting is to stock up on products like meats and to buy the necessary ingredients to prepare the food.  Her plan is to take care of her customers well always offering good quality to earn income that will help her improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy meat and food-preparation ingredients.

loans.name: Lourdes Esperanza

texts.es:
Lourdes, quiere surtir mas el negocio aumentando la producción de tortillas por eso solicita un préstamo que le ayude a comprarse leña por mayor cantidad maíz, bolsas y papel de empaque, con esto espera mejorar y aumentar la producción con sus clientes.
El efecto que tuvo con el préstamo anterior fue positivo logrando realizar las inversiones que le han permitido mantenerse hasta este momento en el negocio, su situación familiar a mejorado pero quiere a futuro realizarle alguna mejoras a la vivienda.
texts.en:
Lourdes wants to supply her business more, increasing the production of tortillas. For this she is requesting a loan that will help her to buy larger quantities of firewood, corn, bags and paper for wrapping. With this she hopes to improve and increase the production with her clients.

The previous loan had a positive effect. She has succeeded in carrying out the investments that have permitted her to maintain the business until this moment. Her family situation has improved but she wants to carry out some improvements to the home in the future.

loans.use: to buy firewood, corn, bags and paper for wrapping

loans.name: Marta Corina

texts.es:
Marta, solicita un préstamo para mejorar su inventario en el negocio de la venta de tortillas obteniendo maíz, leña y gas por mayor cantidad ya que esto le permite obtener mejores precios con los proveedores dejándole un mayor margen de ganancia, de la cual dispone para cubrir sus necesidades y el pago de sus obligaciones.
Ella a tenido una experiencia positiva con el préstamo anterior ya que logro abastecerse de la materia prima con la que mejoro sus ventas y sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Marta is asking for a loan to improve the inventory of her business selling tortillas by obtaining corn, firewood, and gas in greater quantity. This will allow her to get better prices with the suppliers and will leave her with a larger profit margin, from which she covers her necessities and pays what she owes.

She has had a positive experience with the previous loan, since she was able to stock up on raw materials, with which she improved her sales and her earnings.

loans.use: to purchase corn, firewood, and gas.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es:
Doña Teresa, tiene 56 años de edad, es madre soltera, vive en una aldea rural de Puerto Cortes, tiene 5 hijos de 31, 27, 23, 16 y 9 años de edad, dos de ellos están estudiando.
Desde hace 10 años se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas de maíz, y además vende carne  y algunas verduras y frutas en cantidades pequeñas. Ella trabaja muy duro todo el día. Su  clientela está en su aldea y ha crecido. De este negocio salen los ingresos que cubren los gastos de alimentación y gastos de estudio de sus hijos.
Ha   trabajado con financiamiento con ODEF, este es su séptimo préstamo y lo utiliza para compra de materia prima como el Maíz, carnes, verduras y frutas, para ofrecer más producto a sus clientes y aumentar sus ventas. El préstamo anterior le ayudo mucho ella pudo hacerle arreglos al techo de su cocina y ahora ya no se moja cuando llueve al momento de cocinar. 
Sus metas son seguir creciendo con el negocio y mejorar el nivel de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Teresa is 56 years old and a single mother. She lives in a rural village in Puerto Cortes. She has five children; ages 31, 27, 23, 16, and 9. Two of them attend school.

She has been making and selling corn tortillas for ten years. She also sells meat and some fruits and vegetables in small quantities. She works very hard all day. Her customers are in her village, and clientele has grown.

It is from this business that she gets the income to cover the food expenses and her children’s educational expenses.

She has worked with loans from ODEF. This is her seventh loan. She will use it to buy raw material like corn, meat, fruits, and vegetables.  She will do this in order to offer more products to her customers and to increase her sales.  The previous loan helped her a lot.  She was able to make repairs to the roof of her kitchen.  Now it does not get wet when it rains at cooking time.

Her goals are to keep growing in the business and to improve her family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to buy corn to make tortillas and fruit and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Santos Estela

texts.es:
Santos, solicita un préstamo para el fortalecimiento de su negocio invirtiéndolo en marisco fresco como pescados, conchas, camarones para poder tener fortalecido el negocio y abastecer la demanda de sus clientes, espera tener buenos resultados con la presente inversión y poder salir bien en sus pagos.
El préstamo anterior le ayudo a mejorar sus ventas y la variedad en el producto, manteniéndose competente para tener mayor oportunidad de crecimiento y mejorar las condiciones en su familia.
texts.en:
Santos is asking for a loan to strengthen her business buying fresh seafood like fish, scallops and shrimp to strengthen the business and meet customer demand; she hopes to get good results with the present investment and to be able to make her payments well.

The previous loan helped her to improve her sales and the variety of her products thus staying competitive to have greater growth opportunities and to improve her family’s condition.

loans.use: to buy seafood.

loans.name: Maria Antonia

texts.es:
María, solicita un préstamo para mejorar el inventario actual de su pupuseria comprándose los materiales necesarios quesillo, chicharrón, aceite, condimentos, bebidas, que le permitan aumentar su producción y a atender mejor a la clientela.
Con el préstamo anterior a logrado estabilizarse mejorando sus ventas y manteniendo los materiales necesarios que le han permitido mejorar también sus condiciones económicas.
texts.en: María is asking for a loan to improve the current inventory in her pupusa [stuffed, grilled corn cakes] shop; she will buy necessary supplies like string cheese, fried pork rind, oil, and condiments, soft-drinks that will allow her to increase production and provide better customer care.  She managed to stabilize with the previous loan improving sales and having the necessary materials that have resulted in her also improving her economic conditions.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es:
Miguel tiene 64 años,  vive en unión libre,  tiene 5 hijos, vive en el Municipio de Cofradía Cortes.
La actividad que le genera ingresos a Don Miguel es una pulpería la cual tiene establecida desde hace 8 meses en su casa de habitación. El decidió poner este negocio por la necesidad de no contar con un empleo que le ayudara a solventar los gastos de su familia. con la ayuda de sus esposa ha sabido administrar la pulpería donde vende productos de la canasta básica, lácteos, embutidos , refrescos etc. Dice que esta muy contento porque desde que inicio ha tenido buena clientela y así mismo sus ventas han sido muy buenas.
Don Miguel ha solicitado un préstamo de 3,500 lempiras para compra producto para surtir el negocio como granos, lácteos embutidos etc. Para ofrecer más producto a sus clientes.
Su meta es crecer económicamente y lograr establecer una abarrotería.
texts.en:
Miguel, 64, lives in a common law relationship; he has five children and lives in the municipality of Cofradía, Cortes.

Miguel’s income generating activity is a grocery store he’s had at home for the last 8 months.  He decided to establish this business because of need in not having employment to help cover family expenses.  With help from his wife he’s known how to run the grocery store where he sells basic staple items, dairy products, cured meats, soft-drinks, etc.  He says that he’s very happy because he’s had a good clientele since he opened the store and his sales have been very good.

Miguel is asking for a 3,500 lempira loan to buy products like grains, dairy products, cured meats, etc. to stock the business to offer more products to his customers.  His goal is to grow economically and manage to establish a larger grocery store.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock his store.

loans.name: Mirna Yessenia

texts.es:
Mirna, está soltera, vive con sus familiares, ella es empleada como secretaria, tiene dos años de trabajar, ella ha iniciado un negocio que es la venta de joyería enchapada en oro, esta la inicio hace seis meses, su intensión es buscar las alternativas necesarias aumentar sus ingresos.
Ella solicita un préstamo para comprarse más joyería, porque así podrá ofrecer una mayor variedad a los clientes de aretes, cadenas, pulseras, anillos, pues considera que a través del préstamo podrá mejorar las ventas, y ganarse mayor clientela.
La aspiración de Mirna es poder crecer en el negocio, poder ayudar aun más a su familia y crear un buen historial de crédito.
texts.en:
Mirna is single and lives with family members.  She is employed as a secretary and has been working for two years.  Six months ago she started a business selling gold-plated jewelry.  Her goal is to try to find the alternatives necessary to increase her income.

She is requesting a loan to buy more jewelry so she will be able to offer her customers a better selection of earrings, necklaces, bracelets, and rings.  She considers that with the loan she will be able to improve sales and attract more customers.

Mirna's goal is to be able to grow in her business, to help her family even more, and to establish a good credit history.

loans.use: to buy gold-plated earrings, rings, necklaces, and bracelets.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fruit.

loans.name: Xiomara Elizabeth

texts.es:
Xiomara, quiere seguir trabajando en su venta de comida por eso solicita su nuevo préstamo para realizar la compra de insumos como aceite, carnes, pollo, verduras, vegetales, condimentos, y otros productos que sean necesarios para la elaboración de alimentos.
Ella tubo un efecto positivo con el préstamo anterior aumentando su producción sus ventas y el número de clientes atendidos, este avance le permitió ahorrarse dinero y construir un nuevo cuarto en su casa.
texts.en:
Xiomara wants to continue working selling food, so she is requesting another loan to buy ingredients such as oil, meat, chicken, vegetables, greens, condiments, and other products necessary to make the dishes.

The previous loan had a positive effect, increasing her production, her sales, and the number of customers served.  This step forward allowed her to save money and build a new room in her house.

loans.use: to buy oil, meat, chicken, vegetables, greens, and condiments.

loans.name: Jose Ramon

texts.es:
José, solicita un nuevo préstamo pues considera que es una buena alternativa para crecer en su negocio, comprara ganado lechero y le dará mantenimiento a la granja de cerdos el considera que esta mejorando en el desarrollo de sus actividades agropecuarias.
Con el préstamo anterior logro comprar medicamentos para proporcionárselo a su ganado y a sus cerdos así asegurara prevenirlos de enfermedades, sus condiciones familiares han sido mejor incrementando sus ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
José is seeking a new loan because it will help him grow his business.  He will buy dairy cows and he will also perform maintenance on his pig farm.  This will help him in developing his agricultural activities.

With his previous loan, he bought medicine for his cattle and pigs to prevent disease.  His family's economic situation has improved because his income increased.

loans.use: to buy dairy cows and supplies for his farm.

loans.name: Maria Josefina

texts.es:
María, solicita un préstamo para invertir en el negocio comprándose los materiales para realizar arreglos florales artificiales, comprara un surtido de diferentes flores artificiales canastas, madera, para poder ofrecer a la clientela un mayor surtido.
Con el préstamo anterior también fortaleció el negocio ayudándole a seguir trabajando y proveyendo para su familia todo lo necesario y crecer en el mercado.
texts.en:
María is asking for a loan to invest in the business buying materials to make artificial flower arrangements; she will buy an assortment of different artificial flowers, baskets and wood to offer customers a wider selection.

She strengthened the business with the previous loan also helping her to continue working and providing her family with everything needed and to grow in the market.

loans.use: to buy artificial flowers, baskets and wood.

loans.name: Bartola Inés

texts.es: Bartola Inés tiene 38 años y es muy conocida como una mujer responsable, amable, trabajadora y sobre todo emprendedora. Con la ayuda de su esposo mantiene su hogar dado que los dos trabajan duramente para llevar el sustento a sus hijos. Posee  casa propia en la cual habita y ha establecido su negocio. El negocio consiste en una pequeña tienda en la cual vende variedad de artículos como: golosinas, azúcar, arroz, frijoles, bebidas gaseosas, pan y otros productos de primera necesidad que son atractivos para los clientes. Gracias a su buen desempeño y servicio, ha logrado ganarse la confianza de sus vecinos los cuales expresan estar muy satisfechos con el servicio que ella ofrece. El negocio se encuentra en una de las calles principales de la zona. Solicita este crédito para darle un impulso a su negocio. Ella prevé que con un aumento en su inventario logrará aumentar el movimiento de la tienda, ya que la clientela lo demanda y podrá percibir un poco más ingresos, lo cual le permitirá continuar colaborando con la economía del hogar. Es por esta razón que se acerco a esta institución, INTEGRAL, para que le brinde el apoyo que necesita para comprar: bebidas, pan, cereales, golosinas, aceite, macarrones, productos de limpieza y otros.  Con la esperanza de mejorar los niveles de ingresos y así poder cubrir las necesidades básicas de su familia.
texts.en:
Bartola Inés, 38, is very well known as a responsible, kind, hardworking but above all enterprising woman.  With help from her husband she supports her home given that both of them work hard to provide sustenance for their children.  

She owns the house she lives in and that she’s set up her business in.  The business consists of a small store where she sells a variety of articles like snacks, rice, sugar, beans, soft-drinks, bread and other basic staple items that are attractive to customers.  Thanks to the good care and service she’s managed to win over the trust of her neighbors who state that they are very satisfied with the service she provides.  The business is located on one of the zone’s main streets.

She requests this loan to give her business a push.  She foresees that with an increase in inventory she will succeed in increasing movement in the store since customers are making demands and she could earn a bit more income that will allow her to continue collaborating with the home’s economy.

It’s because of this that she approached INTEGRAL so that it will give her the necessary support she needs to buy soft-drinks, bread, cereals, snacks, oil, macaroni, beauty products and others hoping to improve income levels and thus cover her family’s basic needs.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Maria Juana

texts.es:
María, solicita un nuevo préstamo para el fortalecimiento del negocio de cerdos y ganado, comprándose 6 cerdos medianos para crecerlos ya también compara alimento para los mismos cerdos y el ganado, con lo que tendrá lo necesario para seguir con su granja.
El efecto que tuvo con el préstamo anterior fue positivo, creciendo con su negocio de la tienda, incrementando sus ganancias, con el buen manejo del préstamo logro ofrecer una mejor situación de vida a su familia, con lo que estará sacando a sus hijos adelante en sus estudios.
texts.en:
María is requesting another loan to strengthen her pig and cattle business.  She is buying six medium-sized pigs to raise.  She also will buy feed for these pigs and for the cattle.  With this she will have everything she needs to continue with her farm.

The effect of the previous loan was positive, growing her store business and increasing her profits.  By managing the loan well she was able to give her family better living conditions, with which she will be getting her children ahead in their studies.

loans.use: to buy six pigs and concentrated feed.

loans.name: Sandra Lorena

texts.es:
Sandra, necesita invertir para el fortalecimiento de su negocio comprando productos de belleza por catálogos (maquillajes, labiales, cremas) los cuales sale a ofrecer casa por casa en las zonas aledañas a su vivienda, esta a sido su manera de trabajar durante años logrando mantenerse  hasta el momento y cubriendo sus necesidades básicas.
El efecto que tubo con el préstamo anterior fue positivo ya que se abasteció de productos de belleza y salió a ofrecer a los clientes con esto a logrado mantenerse y pagar las cuotas del préstamo.
texts.en:
Sandra needs to invest in the strengthening of her business buying beauty products from catalogues (make-up, lipstick, creams) that she goes out selling house to house in areas adjacent to her house.  This has been her method of work for years managing to support herself to date and covering basic needs.
